jp_1: このはなし一寸の事やとをもうなよ
jp_2: せかい一れつたすけたいから

en: Know that the mind of God is truly filled with deep concerns for you day after day.
ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no shinjitsu wa   fukai omowaku aru to omoe yo
jp_1: にち／＼に神の心のしんぢつわ
jp_2: ふかいをもわくあるとをもへよ

en: Until now, to God's regret, Nihon has been dominated, obeying those of Kara.
ro: imamade wa nihon ga kara ni shitagote   mamani shirareta Kami no zannen
jp_1: いまゝでハにほんかからにしたごふて
jp_2: まゝにしられた神のざんねん

en: Watch the workings of God given in return! No one will be able to imitate Me, whoever one may be.
ro: kono kayashi Kami no hataraki kore o miyo   ikana mono demo mane wa dekemai
jp_1: このかやし神のはたらきこれをみよ
jp_2: いかなものでもまねわでけまい

en: No matter how strong they may be, if God should withdraw, they will be powerless.
ro: ika hodono goteki taru to yuta tote   Kami ga shirizoku kore kanaimai
jp_1: いかほどのごふてきたるとゆうたとて
jp_2: 神がしりぞくこれかないまい

en: It is the same as this for everyone in all matters. Know that God will work freely and unlimitedly.
ro: nani nitemo mina ichiretsu wa kono dori   Kami ga juyo suru to omoe yo
jp_1: なにゝてもみな一れつハこのどふり
jp_2: 神がぢうよふするとをもゑよ

en: Ponder well! No matter how young, old, or weak you may be, I shall give you My free and unlimited workings according to your mind.
ro: shiyan seyo wakai toshiyori yowaki demo   kokoro shidai ni ikana juyo
jp_1: しやんせよハかいとしよりよハきでも
jp_2: 心しだいにいかなぢうよふ

en: Even until now, though you have lived in the same way, none of you has known of God's free and unlimited workings.
ro: imamade mo onaji kurashite itaru tomo   Kami no juyo shirita mono nashi
jp_1: いまゝでもをなぢくらしていたるとも
jp_2: 神のぢうよふしりたものなし

en: From now on, I shall teach you about any and all matters. Make certain you make no errors of the mind.
ro: korekara wa yorozu no koto o mina tokude   kokoro chigai no nai yoni seyo
jp_1: これからハよろづの事をみなとくで
jp_2: 心ちがいのないよふにせよ

en: Until now, there has been much talk of rebirth as oxen or horses, but there has been no one who knows his past or future.
ro: imamade wa gyuba to yu wa mama aredo   ato saki shireta koto wa arumai
jp_1: いまゝでハぎうばとゆうハまゝあれど
jp_2: あとさきしれた事ハあるまい

en: This time, I shall make your future known in this life: look at the disorder of the body!
ro: konotabi wa saki naru koto o kono yo kara   shirashite oku de mi ni sawari miyo
jp_1: このたびハさきなる事を此よから
jp_2: しらしてをくでみにさハりみよ

en: In this world, however much you may be concerned about yourself, you are helpless against the anger of God.
ro: kono yo wa ika hodo waga mi omotemo   Kami no rippuku kore wa kanawan
jp_1: このよふハいかほどハがみをもふても
jp_2: 神のりいふくこれハかなハん

en: None of you needs self-centered concern. God will distinguish between each of you.
ro: meme ni waga mi shiyan wa iran mono   Kami ga sorezore miwake suru zo ya
jp_1: めへ／＼にハがみしやんハいらんもの
jp_2: 神がそれ／＼みわけするぞや

en: Among those living in the same residence, know that there are both god and buddha.
ro: hito yashiki onaji kurashite iru uchi ni   Kami mo hotoke mo aru to omoe yo
jp_1: 一やしきをなじくらしているうちに
jp_2: 神もほとけもあるとをもへよ

en: If you see this, be convinced, whoever you may be: God will distinguish between good and evil.
ro: kore o mite ikana mono demo tokushin se   zen to aku to o wakete miseru de
jp_1: これをみていかなものでもとくしんせ
jp_2: 善とあくとをわけてみせるで

en: Ponder over this talk, all of you in the world. There is no mind the same as another.
ro: kono hanashi mina ichiretsu wa shiyan seyo   onaji kokoro wa sarani arumai
jp_1: このはなしみな一れつハしやんせよ
jp_2: をなじ心わさらにあるまい

en: Even between parent and child, husband and wife, and brothers and sisters: their minds all differ from one another.
ro: oyako demo fufu no naka mo kyodai mo   mina meme ni kokoro chigau de
jp_1: をやこでもふう／＼のなかもきよたいも
jp_2: みなめへ／＼に心ちがうで

en: Indicating no one in the world in particular, I say to you: dust in the mind causes disorders of the body.
ro: sekaiju doko no mono towa yuwan de na   kokoro no hokori mi ni sawari tsuku
jp_1: せかいぢうどこのものとハゆハんでな
jp_2: 心のほこりみにさハりつく

en: Ponder over your sufferings of the body and then ponder the mind that leans on God.
ro: minouchi no nayamu koto oba shiyan shite   Kami ni motareru kokoro shiyan se
jp_1: みのうちのなやむ事をばしやんして
jp_2: 神にもたれる心しやんせ

en: It does not matter how difficult your condition may be, for God desires to reveal free and unlimited workings quickly.
ro: dono yona mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   Kami no juyo hayaku misetai
jp_1: どのよふなむつかし事とゆうたとて
jp_2: 神のぢうよふはやくみせたい

en: Until now, there has been no one who knows the truth of God's free and unlimited workings.
ro: imamade wa Kami no juyo shinjitsu o   shiritaru mono wa sarani nai node
jp_1: いまゝでハ神のぢうよふしんぢつを
jp_2: しりたるものさらにないので

en: From now on, no matter how serious your illness may be, nothing is incurable. It depends on your mind.
ro: korekara wa ikana mutsukashi yamai demo   kokoro shidai ni naorande nashi
jp_1: これからハいかなむつかしやまいでも
jp_2: 心したいになをらんでなし

en: If God accepts your mind of sincerity, I shall work freely and unlimitedly in any matter.
ro: shinjitsu no kokoro o Kami ga uketoreba   ikana juyo shite miseru de na
jp_1: しんぢつの心を神がうけとれば
jp_2: いかなぢうよふしてみせるてな

en: You close to Me, quickly become enlightened in this teaching of the truth of God.
ro: kora hodono Kami no shinjitsu kono hanashi   soba naru mono wa hayaku satore yo
jp_1: こらほどの神のしんぢつこのはなし
jp_2: そばなるものハはやくさとれよ

en: If you quickly become enlightened in this one matter, everything will proceed accordingly.
ro: kore saika hayaku satori ga tsuita nara   nani ni tsuitemo mina kono dori
jp_1: これさいかはやくさとりがついたなら
jp_2: なにゝついてもみなこのどふり

en: Until today, I have never hastened you in any way. Now, I hasten you toward the broad path.
ro: kyomade wa nani yono koto mo sekane domo   mo sekikomu de okwan no michi
jp_1: けふまでハなによの事もせかねとも
jp_2: もふせきこむでをふくハんのみち

en: Never think this path is worldly common. It is the beginning of the Divine Record for eternity.
ro: kono michi wa sekainami towa omouna yo   kore matsudai no Koki hajimari
jp_1: このみちハせかいなみとハをもうなよ
jp_2: これまつだいのこふきはぢまり

en: I do not say where the performers will be found. All will come because of disorders of the body.
ro: kono ninju doko ni aru towa yuwan de na   minouchi sawari mina kuru de aro
jp_1: このにんぢうとこにあるとハゆハんでな
jp_2: みのうちさハりみなくるであろ

en: These disorders are from My guidance, admonition, or anger. Ponder, each of you.
ro: kono sawari tebiki iken mo rippuku mo   mina meme ni shiyan shite miyo
jp_1: このさハりてびきいけんもりいふくも
jp_2: みなめへ／＼にしやんしてみよ

en: What are your thoughts on hearing this talk? I appeal to you repeatedly out of My deep love for you.
ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   kawai amarite kudoku koto nari
jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
jp_2: かハいあまりてくどく事なり

en: However I may express My admonition or anger, I shall never say that you will not be saved.
ro: dono yoni iken rippuku yuta tote   kore tasuken to sarani yuwan de
jp_1: どのよふにいけんりいふくゆうたとて
jp_2: これたすけんとさらにゆハんで

en: Think of you humans admonishing your children. The anger, too, comes from love.
ro: ningen no waga ko no iken omote miyo   hara no tatsu no mo kawai yue kara
jp_1: にんけんのハがこのいけんをもてみよ
jp_2: はらのたつのもかハいゆへから

en: Ponder and come follow Me with firm resolve. There is a path of hope in the future.
ro: shiyan shite kokoro sadamete tsuitekoi   sue wa tanomoshi michi ga aru zo ya
jp_1: しやんして心さためてついてこい
jp_2: すゑハたのもしみちがあるぞや

en: Until now, because the day had not yet come, I have overlooked your mistaken minds.
ro: imamade wa kokoro chigai wa arita tote   hi ga kitarande miyurushite ita
jp_1: いまゝでハ心ちがいわありたとて
jp_2: ひがきたらんてみゆるしていた

en: This time, by all means, I shall sweep clean your innermost heart. Be forewarned!
ro: konotabi wa nandemo kademo mune no uchi   soji o suru de mina shochi seyo
jp_1: このたびはなんでもかでもむねのうち
jp_2: そうちをするでみなしよちせよ

en: The reason for this sweeping of your innermost heart is that the intent of God is deep.
ro: mune no uchi soji o suru to yu no mo na   Kami no omowaku fukaku aru kara
jp_1: むねのうちそふぢをするとゆうのもな
jp_2: 神のをもハくふかくあるから

en: Unless the sweeping is thoroughly accomplished, you will not understand the truth of My heart.
ro: kono soji sukiyaka shitate sen koto ni   mune no shinjitsu wakari nai kara
jp_1: このそふぢすきやかしたてせん事に
jp_2: むねのしんぢつわかりないから

en: When you have truly come to understand My mind, I shall teach you the hand movements of the beginning of this world.
ro: kono kokoro shin kara wakari tsuita nara   kono yo hajimari te o tsukeru nari
jp_1: この心しんからわかりついたなら
jp_2: このよはぢまりてをつけるなり

en: Take no short cuts. Have no greed or arrogance. Come out to the single and straight main path.
ro: chikamichi mo yoku mo koman nai yoni   tada hitosuji no honmichi ni deyo
jp_1: ちかみちもよくもこふまんないように
jp_2: たゞ一すぢのほんみちにでよ

en: When you have come onto this path, this will be the Divine Record forever in Nihon.
ro: kono michi ni tsuitaru naraba itsu made mo   kore nippon no Koki naru no ya
jp_1: このみちについたるならばいつまても
jp_2: これにいほんのこふきなるのや

en: When the Divine Record is made in Nihon, I shall by all means manage Kara as I please.
ro: nihon nimo Koki ga deketa koto naraba   nandemo kara o mamani suru nari
jp_1: にほんにもこふきがでけた事ならば
jp_2: なんでもからをまゝにするなり

en: I have not spoken yet about the truth of those things that came after I began this world.
ro: kono yo o hajimete kara no shinjitsu o   mada imamade wa yuta koto nashi
jp_1: このよふをはぢめてからのしんぢつを
jp_2: またいまゝでハゆうた事なし

en: This talk will be difficult to understand, but if it is left untold, no one will know.
ro: kono hanashi mutsukashi koto de aru keredo   yuwazu ni ireba tare mo shiran de
jp_1: このはなしむつかし事であるけれど
jp_2: ゆハずにいればたれもしらんで

en: Step by step, I shall tell you of any and all matters. Calm your mind and listen closely!
ro: dandan to dono yona koto mo yute kikasu   kokoro shizumete shikato kiku nari
jp_1: たん／＼とどのよな事もゆてきかす
jp_2: 心しずめてしかときくなり

en: Until now, there has been talk about various magical rites. From now on, they shall have no effect.
ro: imanade wa ika naru ho to yuta tote   mo korekara wa ho wa kikande
jp_1: いまゝでハいかなるほふとゆうたとて
jp_2: もふこれからハほふハきかんで

en: In the past, such magical rites have been taught to the branches, but watch the future.
ro: koremade wa edasaki nitewa ho nazo to   oshiete aredo saki o mite iyo
jp_1: これまてハゑださきにてわほふなぞと
jp_2: をしへてあれどさきをみていよ

en: Nihon has known nothing until now, but look forward to the future path.
ro: nihon niwa imamade nanimo shirai demo   korekara saki no michi o tanoshume
jp_1: にほんにハいまゝでなにもしらいでも
jp_2: これからさきのみちをたのしゆめ

en: About magical rites: do not wonder who is making them effective. They are worked by God, who began this world.
ro: ho ya tote tare ga suru towa omouna yo   kono yo hajimeta Kami no nasu koto
jp_1: ほふやとてたれがするとハをもうなよ
jp_2: このよ初た神のなす事

en: However difficult matters may be, if only your sincerity is accepted by God...
ro: dono yona mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   Kami ga shinjitsu uketorita nara
jp_1: どのよふなむつかし事とゆうたとて
jp_2: 神がしんちつうけとりたなら

en: Until now, there has been talk about Kara and Nihon, but from now on there will only be Nihon.
ro: imamade wa kara ya nihon to yutaredo   korekara saki wa nihon bakari ya
jp_1: いまゝでハからやにほんとゆうたれど
jp_2: これからさきハにほんばかりや

en: The branches may look big, but they are weak and break when handled. Watch the future.
ro: edasaki wa oki ni miete akan mono   kamaeba oreru saki o mite iyo
jp_1: ゑださきハをふきにみへてあかんもの
jp_2: かまへばをれるさきをみていよ

en: The origin may seem small, but the root is great. In all things, know the origin!
ro: moto naru wa chiisai yo de ne ga erai   dono yona koto mo moto o shiru nari
jp_1: もとなるハちいさいよふでねがえらい
jp_2: とのよな事も元をしるなり

en: Do not think that incantations or magical arts are great. The mind's sincerity is the true art.
ro: jitsu ya tote ho ga erai to omouna yo   kokoro no makoto kore ga shinjitsu
jp_1: ぢつやとてほふがへらいとをもうなよ
jp_2: こゝろのまことこれがしんぢつ

en: As you humans are shallow, you say that all marvels are magic.
ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   mezurashi koto o ho nazo to yu
jp_1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
jp_2: めづらし事をほふなぞとゆう

en: Even until now, though God is openly revealed, there is yet no one who knows the truth.
ro: imamade wa Kami ga araware detaru tote   mada shinjitsu o shirita mono nashi
jp_1: いまゝでハ神があらハれでたるとて
jp_2: まだしんぢつをしりたものなし

en: Hereafter, when I have taught you the truth of all things,
ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   oshiete oita koto de aru nara
jp_1: このさきハどのよな事もしんじつを
jp_2: をしへてをいた事であるなら

en: Then, I shall show you God's free and unlimited workings in all matters.
ro: sorekara wa Kami no hataraki nanimo kamo   juyojizai o shite miseru de na
jp_1: それからハ神のはたらきなにもかも
jp_2: ぢうよじざいをしてみせるでな

en: When God in Truth begins to work, the minds of all in the world will be purified.
ro: shinjitsu no Kami no hataraki shikaketara   sekai ichiretsu kokoro sumikiru
jp_1: しんぢつの神のはたらきしかけたら
jp_2: せかい一れつ心すみきる

en: What are your thoughts concerning My workings? I shall give returns when I accept your minds.
ro: hataraki mo ika naru koto to omou kana   kokoro uketori shidai kayashi o
jp_1: はたらきもいかなる事とをもうかな
jp_2: 心うけとりしだいかやしを

en: What do you think these returns are about? They will reach you though you be a thousand leagues away.
ro: kono kayashi nanino koto ya to omou kana   michinori sen ri hedate aritemo
jp_1: このかやしなにの事やとをもうかな
jp_2: みちのりせんりへだてありても

en: Whatever you may say or think, I shall give returns as soon as I accept your minds.
ro: kono koto wa nani o yutemo omotemo   uketori shidai suguni kayashi o
jp_1: この事ハなにをゆうてもをもふても
jp_2: うけとりしだいすぐにかやしを

en: Do not wonder what these returns are about. I shall give returns for both good and evil.
ro: kono kayashi nanno koto ya to omouna yo   zen aku tomoni mina kayasu de na
jp_1: このかやしなんの事やとをもうなよ
jp_2: せんあくともにみなかやすてな

en: Whether you speak good or think evil, I shall give returns at once as you deserve.
ro: yoki koto o yutemo ashiki omotemo   sono mama suguni kayasu koto nari
jp_1: よき事をゆうてもあしきをもふても
jp_2: そのまゝすくにかやす事なり

en: If you begin to see this, My purification will reach any and everyone in the whole world.
ro: kono koto o miekita naraba ichiretsu wa   donna mono demo mina sumiwataru
jp_1: この事をみへきたならば一れつわ
jp_2: どんなものでもみなすみわたる

en: Today, though nothing is seen, look toward the eighth month. Then everything will be seen.
ro: kyonohi wa nani ga mieru ya nai keredo   hachi gatsu o miyo mina mieru de na
jp_1: けふの日ハなにがみへるやないけれど
jp_2: 八月をみよみなみへるでな

en: Perhaps you cannot foresee what is going to appear. From the high mountains, a broad path will open.
ro: mieru no mo nanino koto yara shiremai na   takai yama kara okwan no michi
jp_1: みへるのもなにの事やらしれまいな
jp_2: 高い山からをふくハんのみち

en: I have been preparing to open this path, but those of you close to Me know nothing of it.
ro: kono michi o tsukeyo tote ni shikoshirae   soba naru mono wa nanimo shirazu ni
jp_1: このみちをつけよふとてにしこしらへ
jp_2: そばなるものハなにもしらすに

en: Those who come here to summon or to investigate, come because it is God's intent.
ro: kono toko e yobi ni kuru no mo detekuru mo   Kami no omowaku aru kara no koto
jp_1: このとこへよびにくるのもでゝくるも
jp_2: 神のをもハくあるからの事

en: Knowing nothing about this, you close to Me think of it only in worldly terms.
ro: sono koto o nanimo shirazu ni soba naru wa   sekainami naru koto o omote
jp_1: その事をなにもしらすにそばなるハ
jp_2: せかいなみなる事をふもをて

en: Do not think of anything in worldly terms. There is a new and marvelous path for you.
ro: nani nitemo sekainami towa omouna yo   nanika mezurashi michi ga aru zo ya
jp_1: なにゝてもせかいなみとハをもうなよ
jp_2: なにかめつらしみちがあるぞや

en: Though years have passed since the beginning of this world, there is yet no one who knows the truth.
ro: dandan to kono yo hajimete hi wa tatedo   tare ka shinjitsu shirita mono nashi
jp_1: だん／＼とこのよはぢめてひハたてど
jp_2: たれかしんぢつしりたものなし

en: No matter how the mind of God hastens, the minds of all of you are yet inattentive.
ro: ika hodoni Kami no kokoro wa seta tote   mina no kokoro wa mada ukkari to
jp_1: いかほどに神の心わせゑたとて
jp_2: みなの心ハまたうゝかりと

en: Quickly, try the pondering and then hasten. Why are you not preparing to dig up the root?
ro: hayabaya to shiyan shite mite sekikome yo   ne horu moyo nande shiteden
jp_1: はや／＼としやんしてみてせきこめよ
jp_2: ねへほるもよふなんでしてでん

en: There is no one who knows the way to dig up the root, the truth of this world.
ro: kono yo no shinjitsu ne no horikata o   shiritaru mono wa sarani nai node
jp_1: このよふのしんぢつねへのほりかたを
jp_2: しりたるものハさらにないので

en: If you have but truly dug up this root, this path will become truly promising.
ro: kono ne o shinjitsu horita koto naraba   makoto tanomoshi michi ni naru no ni
jp_1: このねへをしんぢつほりた事ならば
jp_2: ま事たのもしみちになるのに

en: When you have passed through this path, completing the digging, both the high and the low will be spirited.
ro: kono michi o horikiri tori nuketa nara   kami shimo tomoni kokoro isamu ni
jp_1: このみちをほりきりとふりぬけたなら
jp_2: 上下ともに心いさむに

en: From now on, I shall make every effort solely for the preparations to make everyone in the world spirited.
ro: korekara wa nandemo sekai ichiretsu o   isameru moyo bakari suru zo ya
jp_1: これからハなんでもせかい一れつを
jp_2: いさめるもよふばかりするそや

en: I shall teach you step by step so that there will be nothing unknown in Nihon.
ro: dandan to nani goto nitemo nihon niwa   shiran koto owa nai to yu yoni
jp_1: だん／＼となに事にてもにほんにハ
jp_2: しらん事をわないとゆうよに

en: I desire to teach the whole world about all matters. The intention of God is truly deep.
ro: nanimo kamo sekaiju e oshietai   Kami no omowaku fukaku aru no ni
jp_1: なにもかもせかいぢうゝへをしへたい
jp_2: 神のをもわくふかくあるのに

en: Unaware of this, all the world thinks My teachings are somehow dangerous.
ro: sore shirazu sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   nando abunaki yoni omote
jp_1: それしらすせかいぢうゝハ一れつに
jp_2: なんどあぶなきよふにをもふて

en: Whatever I say, it is the word of God. What danger can there be?
ro: dono yona koto demo Kami no yu koto ya   nanno abunaki koto ga aru zo ya
jp_1: とのよふな事でも神のゆう事や
jp_2: なんのあぶなき事があるそや

en: Though people speak about any and all matters, there is no understanding.
ro: nanimo kamo yorozu no koto o dandan to   yute inagara wakaritaru nashi
jp_1: なにもかもよろずの事をだん／＼と
jp_2: ゆうていながらわかりたるなし

en: From now on, please quickly make preparations truly to purify your innermost heart.
ro: korekara wa dozo shinjitsu mune no uchi   hayaku sumasuru moyo shite kure
jp_1: これからハどうぞしんぢつむねのうち
jp_2: はやくすまするもよふしてくれ

en: As there are a great number of people in the world, to purify all of them will be difficult.
ro: sekaiju oku no hito de aru karani   kore sumasuru ga mutsukashii koto
jp_1: せかいぢうをふくの人てあるからに
jp_2: これすまするがむつかしい事

en: However difficult it may be, see the truth through your own mind!
ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   waga kokoro yori shinjitsu o miyo
jp_1: いかほどにむつかし事とゆうたとて
jp_2: わが心よりしんちつをみよ

en: When the mind is made pure and open to reason, the truth will be seen of its own accord.
ro: kono kokoro sumushi wakarita koto naraba   sono mama mieru koto de aru nari
jp_1: この心すむしわかりた事ならば
jp_2: そのまゝみゑる事であるなり

en: There may be no one at all who knows the true working of God day after day.
ro: nichinichi ni Kami no shinjitsu hataraki o   shiritaru mono wa sarani arumai
jp_1: にち／＼に神のしんぢつはたらきを
jp_2: しりたるものハさらにあるまい

en: In whatever matters, I shall show you marvels through the free and unlimited workings of God.
ro: nani nitemo Kami no juyo to yu mono wa   mezurashi koto o shite miseru de na
jp_1: なにゝても神のぢうよとゆうものハ
jp_2: めづらし事をしてみせるでな

en: Whatever marvels you may see, they are none other than the workings of God.
ro: dono yona mezurashi koto to yuta tote   Kami no suru koto nasu koto bakari
jp_1: とのよふなめつらし事とゆうたとて
jp_2: 神のする事なす事はかり

en: Until now, you have known nothing, but now a narrow path is coming into your sight.
ro: imamade wa nani yono koto mo shirenanda   choto miekaketa hosoi michisuji
jp_1: いままでハなによの事もしれなんだ
jp_2: 一寸みへかけたほそいみちすじ

en: If you follow this path step by step, you will surely see the main path ahead.
ro: kono michi o dandan shitoi iku naraba   nandemo muko ni mieru honmichi
jp_1: このみちをだん／＼しといいくならば
jp_2: なんてもむこにみへるほんみち

en: Until now, you have come through a path where there was no distinction between Kara and Nihon.
ro: koremade ni torite kitaru michisuji wa   kara mo nihon mo wakari nai node
jp_1: これまでにとふりてきたるみちすぢハ
jp_2: からもにほんもわかりないので

en: Hereafter, however highly Kara is regarded, in no case will Nihon be overcome.
ro: konosaki wa nanbo kara ya to yuta tote   nihon ga makeru tameshi nai zo ya
jp_1: このさきハなんぼからやとゆうたとて
jp_2: にほんがまけるためしないそや

en: I shall let you dig up the root of this world's origin. If you have the strength, do your best to dig it up.
ro: kono yo no moto hajimari no ne o horaso   chikara aru nara horikirite miyo
jp_1: このよふのもとはじまりのねをほらそ
jp_2: ちからあるならほりきりてみよ

en: If only you have dug up this root completely, no one will be your match, whoever one may be.
ro: kono ne o horikiri saika shitaru nara   dono yona mono mo kanau mono nashi
jp_1: このねへをほりきりさいかしたるなら
jp_2: どのよなものもかなうものなし

en: Listen carefully: whatever you may say or think, or wherever you may say or think,
ro: shikato kike kuchi de yutemo omotemo   doko de yutemo omotaru tote
jp_1: しかときけくちでゆうてもをもふても
jp_2: どこでゆうてもをもふたるとて

en: I shall give a return just as you deserve. Beware, all of you, for God may withdraw!
ro: sono mamani kayashi to yu wa kono koto ya   Kami ga shirizoku mina shochi seyo
jp_1: そのまゝにかやしとゆうハこの事や
jp_2: 神がしりぞくみなしよちせよ

en: This time, I shall begin to tell you something marvelous. Calm your minds and please listen.
ro: konotabi wa mezurashi koto o yui kakeru   kokoro shizumete kore kiite kure
jp_1: このたひハめづらし事をゆいかける
jp_2: 心しずめてこれきいてくれ

en: Everything is what God says or does. I shall never cause trouble to you who are close to Me.
ro: nani goto mo Kami no suru koto yu koto ya   soba ni shinpai kakeru koto nashi
jp_1: なに事も神のする事ゆう事や
jp_2: そばにしんバいかける事なし

en: All of you, please calm your minds and become truly convinced of this talk.
ro: kono hanashi dodo shinjitsu ichiretsu wa   kokoro shizumete shochi shite kure
jp_1: このはなしどふどしんぢつ一れつわ
jp_2: 心しづめてしよちしてくれ

en: What do you think this path is? It is the true path that will settle this world.
ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   kono yo osameru shinjitsu no michi
jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: このよをさめるしんぢつのみち

en: When the distinction between fire and water in the high places is made, joyousness will settle of its own accord.
ro: kami taru no hii to mizu to o waketa nara   hitori osamaru yokizukume ni
jp_1: 上たるの火と水とをわけたなら
jp_2: ひとりをさまるよふきづくめに

en: Know that the distinction between fire and water will be made by the performance of the Joyous Service at this place.
ro: kono hi mizu wakeru to yu wa kono tokoro   Yoki-zutome o suru to omoe yo
jp_1: この火水わけるとゆうハこのところ
jp_2: よふきづとめをするとをもゑよ

en: I shall do marvelous things, the same as My beginning of this world.
ro: kono yo o hajime kaketa mo onaji koto   mezurashi koto o shite miseru de na
jp_1: このよふをはじめかけたもをなぢ事
jp_2: めずらし事をしてみせるでな

en: I shall begin a Service which has never existed since I began this world, and assuredly settle the world.
ro: kono yo o hajimete karani nai Tsutome   mata hajime kake tashika osameru
jp_1: このよふをはじめてからにないつとめ
jp_2: またはじめかけたしかをさめる

en: There may be no one at all who knows the truth of the mind of Tsukihi of this universe.
ro: kono yo no Tsukihi no kokoro shinjitsu o   shiritaru mono wa sarani arumai
jp_1: このよふの月日の心しんぢつを
jp_2: しりたるものわさらにあるまい

en: Until now, you have been saying that you cannot see a god with your own eyes, whatever kind of god he may be.
ro: koremade wa ika naru Kami to yuta tote   me ni mien to yute ita nari
jp_1: これまでハいかなる神とゆうたとて
jp_2: めゑにみへんとゆうていたなり

en: This time, truly revealing whatever gods there may be, I shall speak to you.
ro: konotabi wa dono yona Kami mo shinjitsu ni   araware dashite hanashi suru nari
jp_1: このたびわとのよな神もしんぢつに
jp_2: あらハれだしてはなしするなり

en: From this time on, whatever you say or think will appear just as you say or think. This is the wonder.
ro: imakara wa nani o yutemo omotemo   sono mama mieru kore ga fushigi ya
jp_1: いまからハなにをゆうてもをもふても
jp_2: そのまゝみへるこれがふしぎや

en: At the sign of the wheat harvest, all things will begin to appear. Hurry and begin the Joyous Service.
ro: nanimo kamo aki o aizu ni mie kakeru   Yoki-zutome ni hayaku kakare yo
jp_1: なにもかもあきをあいづにみへかける
jp_2: よふきづとめにはやくかゝれよ

en: There are a great number of people living throughout the world, but their minds are all as if in a haze.
ro: sekaiju oku kurasuru sono uchi wa   ichiretsu wa mina moya no gotoku ya
jp_1: せかいぢうをふくくらするそのうちわ
jp_2: 一れつハみなもやのごとくや

en: Day by day, your innermost heart will be purified and understanding will come. You will come to see the truth as you mature.
ro: nichinichi ni sumushi wakarishi mune no uchi   sejin shidai miete kuru zo ya
jp_1: にち／＼にすむしわかりしむねのうち
jp_2: せゑぢんしたいみへてくるぞや

en: When this path is clearly seen, take delight. Your future will be promising.
ro: kono michi ga tashika mietaru koto naraba   konosaki tashika tanoshun de iyo
jp_1: このみちがたしかみへたる事ならば
jp_2: このさきたしかたのしゆでいよ

en: Step by step, hasten with spirited minds. I am hurrying to have you go out to the main path.
ro: dandan to kokoro isande sekikome yo   hayaku honmichi isogi deru zo ya
jp_1: たん／＼と心いさんでせきこめよ
jp_2: はやくほんみちいそぎでるぞや

en: When God has accepted the sincerity in the minds of the ten performers of the Service,
ro: shinjitsu no Tsutome no ninju ju nin no   kokoro o Kami ga uketorita nara
jp_1: しんぢつのつとめの人ぢう十人の
jp_2: 心を神がうけとりたなら

en: Thereafter, I shall teach you all of the thoughts of God on every matter step by step.
ro: sorekara wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   Kami no omowaku mina tokikikasu
jp_1: それからハどのよな事もたん／＼と
jp_2: 神のをもわくみなときゝかす

en: Though the mind of God hastens day after day, to what avail if the ten performers do not assemble?
ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro wa seta tote   ninju ju nin soroi nakeneba
jp_1: にち／＼に神の心わせゑたとて
jp_2: 人ぢう十人そろいなけねば

en: Take warning: fire, water, and wind will withdraw from the three deemed as right-hand men among the ten.
ro: ju nin no naka ni san nin kataude wa   hii mizu kaze tomo shirizoku to shire
jp_1: 十人のなかに三人かたうでわ
jp_2: 火水風ともしりそくとしれ

en: Whatever happens, it is the work of God. Never think it is an illness.
ro: dono yona koto demo Kami no suru koto ya   kore o yamai to sarani omouna
jp_1: どのよふな事でも神のする事や
jp_2: これをやまいとさらにをもうな

en: I work all matters because I truly desire to let you know of the free and unlimited workings of God.
ro: nanimo kamo shinjitsu Kami no juyo o   shirashitai kara shite miseru de na
jp_1: なにもかもしんぢつ神のぢふよふを
jp_2: しらしたいからしてみせるでな

en: Until now, no matter what path you may have been on, I kept still because the day had not yet come.
ro: koremade wa ika naru michi o toritemo   hi ga kitarande izumi ita nari
jp_1: これまでハいかなるみちをとふりても
jp_2: ひがきたらんでいづみいたなり

en: Hereafter, I shall tell you the real truth of all matters step by step.
ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   honshinjitsu o yute kikasuru
jp_1: このさきハどのよな事もたん／＼と
jp_2: ほんしんぢつをゆうてきかする

en: Until now, people have worshipped and prayed to a great many gods.
ro: imamade wa ika naru Kami mo yamayama ni   ogami kito to yuta naredomo
jp_1: いまゝでハいかなる神も山／＼に
jp_2: をがみきとふとゆうたなれども

en: Should there be anyone who knows the origin, God permits you to seek and inquire.
ro: kono moto o shiritaru mono ga aru naraba   tazune ite miyo Kami ga yurusuru
jp_1: このもとをしりたるものかあるならば
jp_2: たづねいてみよ神がゆるする

en: In the future when the main path is opened, I shall teach you everything step by step.
ro: matasaki wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   honmichi tsuketa koto de aru nara
jp_1: またさきハとのよな事もたん／＼と
jp_2: ほんみちつけた事であるなら

en: I shall begin to tell you solely of that which had never existed before, and teach you the Service for universal salvation.
ro: imamade ni nai koto bakari yui kakete   yorozu tasuke no Tsutome oshieru
jp_1: いまゝでにない事ばかりゆいかけて
jp_2: よろづたすけのつとめをしへる

en: Among the ten performers of this Service, there are those who take the role of the Parent of the beginnings of origin.
ro: kono Tsutome ju nin ninju sono naka ni   moto hajimari no Oya ga iru nari
jp_1: このつとめ十人にんぢうそのなかに
jp_2: もとはじまりのをやがいるなり

en: I drew forth Izanagi and Izanami and taught them the providence of how to begin human beings.
ro: Izanagi to Izanamii to o hikiyosete   ningen hajime shugo oshieta
jp_1: いざなぎといざなみいとをひきよせて
jp_2: にんけんはぢめしゆごをしゑた

en: At the origin were a fish and a serpent in the muddy ocean. I drew them up and began the first couple.
ro: kono moto wa doroumi naka ni uo to mi to   sore hikidashite fufu hajimeta
jp_1: このもとハどろうみなかにうをとみと
jp_2: それひきだしてふう／＼はちめた

en: In the beginnings of origin, this universe was a muddy ocean. Therein were only loaches.
ro: kono yo no moto hajimari wa doro no umi   sono naka yori mo dojo bakari ya
jp_1: このよふの元はじまりハとろのうみ
jp_2: そのなかよりもどぢよばかりや

en: Among them were a fish and a serpent. Looking closely, I saw that they had human faces.
ro: sono uchi ni uo to mii to ga majiriiru   yoku misumaseba ningen no kao
jp_1: そのうちにうをとみいとがまちりいる
jp_2: よくみすませばにんげんのかを

en: Seeing this, an idea came to none other than the sincere mind of Tsukihi.
ro: sore o mite omoi tsuita wa shinjitsu no   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
jp_1: それをみてをもいついたハしんぢつの
jp_2: 月日の心ばかりなるそや

en: If I should add instruments to them and teach them My providence step by step,
ro: kono mono ni dogu o yosete dandan to   shugo oshieta koto de aru nara
jp_1: このものにどふくをよせてたん／＼と
jp_2: しゆこふをしゑた事であるなら

en: These instruments being Kunisazuchi and Tsukiyomi, if I should put them into their bodies,
ro: kono dogu Kunisazuchii to Tsukiyomi to   kore minouchi e shikomitaru nara
jp_1: このどふくくにさづちいと月よみと
jp_2: これみのうちゑしこみたるなら

en: And call together Kumoyomi, Kashikone, %Otonobe, and Taishokuten,
ro: Kumoyomi to Kashikonee to Otonobe   Taishokuten to yoseta koto nara
jp_1: くもよみとかしこねへとをふとのべ
jp_2: たいしよく天とよせた事なら

en: Then, after holding counsel, God came to the firm decision to begin this world.
ro: sorekara wa tashika sekai o hajime yo to   Kami no sodan shimari tsuitari
jp_1: それからハたしかせかいを初よと
jp_2: かみのそふだんしまりついたり

en: Since that time, the providence of God has been by no means an easy matter.
ro: korekara wa Kami no shugo to yu mono wa   nami taitei na koto de nai zo ya
jp_1: これからわ神のしゆごとゆうものハ
jp_2: なみたいていなことでないそや

en: It is indeed difficult to explain how I began things which had never existed.
ro: imamade ni nai koto bakari hajimeru wa   nani o yu no mo mutsukashiki koto
jp_1: いまゝてにない事ばかりはちめるわ
jp_2: なにをゆうのもむつかしき事

en: There may be no one who knows the truth of the beginning of this world.
ro: kono yo o hajime kaketaru shinjitsu o   tare ka shiritaru mono wa arumai
jp_1: このよふをはちめかけたるしんぢつを
jp_2: たれかしりたるものハあるまい

en: From now on, I shall tell you everything step by step. Never take it to be false.
ro: korekara wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   yute kikasuru uso to omouna
jp_1: これからハとのよな事もたん／＼と
jp_2: ゆうてきかするうそとをもうな

en: I began human beings, taking a fish and a serpent as seed and seedbed.
ro: ningen o hajime kaketa wa uo to mi to   kore nawashiro to tane ni hajimete
jp_1: にんけんをはぢめかけたハうをとみと
jp_2: これなわしろとたねにはじめて

en: Tsukihi entered their bodies and taught them the providence step by step.
ro: kono mono ni Tsukihi tainai irikonde   dandan shugo oshie konda de
jp_1: このものに月日たいない入こんで
jp_2: たん／＼しゆごをしゑこんだで

en: The number of children was nine hundred million, ninety-nine thousand, nine hundred and ninety-nine.
ro: kono kokazu kuoku kuman ni kusen nin   kuhyaku kuju ni ku nin naru zo ya
jp_1: このこかす九をく九まんに九せん人
jp_2: 九百九十に九人なるそや

en: The children were conceived in three days and three nights, and there Izanami stayed for three years and three months.
ro: kono nin o mikka miyosa ni yadoshi komi   san nen mi tsuki todomarite ita
jp_1: この人を三か三よさにやどしこみ
jp_2: 三ねん三月とゝまりていた

en: The first children born were five bu tall and grew taller gradually.
ro: soreyori mo umare dashita wa go bu kara ya   go bu go bu to shite sejin o shita
jp_1: それよりもむまれだしたハ五分からや
jp_2: 五分五分としてせへぢんをした

en: By this providence once taught, the children were conceived in the same body three times.
ro: kono mono ni ichido oshieta kono shugo   onaji tainai sando yadorita
jp_1: このものに一どをしゑたこのしゆごふ
jp_2: をなぢたいない三どやどりた

en: The true and real God of this universe is Tsukihi. The others are all instruments.
ro: kono yo no shinjitsu no Kami Tsukihi nari   ato naru wa mina dogu naru zo ya
jp_1: このよふのしんぢつの神月日なり
jp_2: あとなるわみなどふくなるそや

en: Drawing them forth one after another, I used them to begin human beings and gave to each a sacred name.
ro: ningen o hajime yo tote dandan to   yosete tsukota kore ni kamina o
jp_1: にんけんをはしめよふとてたん／＼と
jp_2: よせてつこふたこれに神なを

en: Izanagi and Izanami are the prime instruments. They are the basis of the Grand Shrine of Teshoko.
ro: Izanagi to Izanamii to ga ichi no Kami   kore Teshoko no Daijingu nari
jp_1: いざなぎといざなみいとが一の神
jp_2: これてしよこの大じんくゝなり

en: In the days to come, I shall teach you everything step by step. It will be solely about things you have never known.
ro: matasaki wa nanika dandan toku keredo   imamade shiran koto bakari ya de
jp_1: またさきハなにかたん／＼とくけれど
jp_2: いまゝてしらん事ばかりやで

en: Hereafter, whatever I say will be solely about the beginnings of human beings.
ro: konosaki wa nani o yutemo ningen o   hajime kaketaru koto bakari ya de
jp_1: このさきハなにをゆうてもにんげんを
jp_2: はぢめかけたる事ばかりやで

en: This is the Residence where I began this world. Therein lives the original Parent of human beginnings.
ro: kono yo o hajime dashitaru yashiki nari   ningen hajime moto no Oya nari
jp_1: このよふをはぢめだしたるやしきなり
jp_2: にんけんはじめもとのをやなり

en: Discerning this, Tsukihi descended from the desire to teach about all matters.
ro: Tsukihi yori sore o misumashi amakudari   nanika yorozu o shirashitai kara
jp_1: 月日よりそれをみすましあまくだり
jp_2: なにかよろづをしらしたいから

en: Truly, the thought in the mind of Tsukihi is to receive the shrine of each.
ro: shinjitsu ni Tsukihi no kokoro omou niwa   meme no yashiro morota koto nara
jp_1: しんぢつに月日の心をもうにわ
jp_2: めへ／＼のやしろもろた事なら

en: Then I would teach exactly as I wish, freely and unlimitedly at any time.
ro: soreyori mo juyojizai ni itsu nari to   omou mama naru hanashi shiyo mono
jp_1: それよりもぢうよぢざいにいつなりと
jp_2: をもうまゝなるはなしゝよもの

en: Even until now, though having firmly received the Shrine of Tsukihi, I have been keeping still.
ro: imamade mo Tsukihi no yashiro shikkari to   morote aredomo izumi ita nari
jp_1: いまゝでも月日のやしろしいかりと
jp_2: もろてあれどもいづみいたなり

en: This time, I shall surely reveal Myself openly and tell you the truth of all matters.
ro: konotabi wa tashika omote i arawarete   nanika yorozu o mina yute kikasu
jp_1: このたびハたしかをもていあらハれて
jp_2: なにかよろつをみなゆてきかす

en: Until now, since I kept Myself behind a bamboo screen, nothing was able to be seen.
ro: imamade wa misu no uchira ni itaru kara   nani yono koto mo miete nakeredo
jp_1: いままでハみすのうぢらにいたるから
jp_2: なによの事もみへてなけれど

en: This time, as I have come out into brightness, everything will be seen quickly.
ro: konotabi wa akai tokoro i detaru kara   dono yona koto mo suguni mieru de
jp_1: このたびハあかいところいでたるから
jp_2: とのよな事もすぐにみゑるで

en: What do you think of these red clothes? Tsukihi dwells within.
ro: kono akai kimono o nanto omote iru   naka ni Tsukihi ga komori iru zo ya
jp_1: このあかいきものをなんとをもている
jp_2: なかに月日がこもりいるそや

en: Even until now, though everything was under the rule of Tsukihi, things were overlooked because the day had not yet come.
ro: imamade mo Tsukihi no mama de aru naredo   hi ga kitarande miyurushite ita
jp_1: いまゝでも月日のまゝであるけれど
jp_2: ひがきたらんでみゆるしていた

en: Now that the time is sufficiently full, I shall manage everything as I intend.

jp_2: あたゑしいかりたしかわたする

en: In whatever matters, unless there is clear proof of the truth, it should remain questionable.

jp_1: とのよふな事でもたしかしんちつの
jp_2: しよこなけねばあやうきい事

en: From now on, I shall teach you everything in detail step by step. Do not go against My words.
ro: korekara wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   komakashiku toku kore somukuna yo
jp_1: これからハとのよな事もたん／＼と
jp_2: こまかしくとくこれそむくなよ

en: Do not wonder what it is that I am saying. It is solely about the preparations for the Kanrodai.
ro: kono hanashi nani o yu ya to omouna yo   Kanrodai no moyo ichijo
jp_1: このはなしなにをゆうやとをもうなよ
jp_2: かんろふだいのもよふ一ぢよ

en: This Stand is to be made one block atop another step by step. The uppermost is to be two shaku and four sun.

jp_1: このだいもたん／＼／＼とつみあけて
jp_2: またそのゆへハ二尺四すんに

en: Place a flat vessel on top, and I shall surely bestow the Food of Heaven.
ro: sono ue e hirabachi nosete oita nara   soreyori tashika jikimotsu o yaro
jp_1: そのうゑゝひらばちのせてをいたなら
jp_2: それよりたしかぢきもつをやろ

en: On whom do you think the Food of Heaven is to be bestowed? It is to be bestowed on the Parent who began this world.

jp_1: ぢきもつをたれにあたへる事ならば
jp_2: このよはじめたをやにわたする

en: There is no one who knows the mind of the Parent who is to receive the Gift from Heaven.
ro: ten yori ni atae o morau sono Oya no   kokoro o tare ka shirita mono nashi
jp_1: 天よりにあたへをもらうそのをやの
jp_2: 心をたれかしりたものなし

en: After Tsukihi surely ascertains the mind, then the Food of Heaven will be bestowed.
ro: Tsukihi yori tashikani kokoro misadamete   soreyori watasu jikimotsu no koto
jp_1: 月日よりたしかに心みさだめて
jp_2: それよりハたすぢきもつの事

en: Once Tsukihi has bestowed it, the rest is up to the mind of the Parent.

jp_1: 月日にハこれをハたしてをいたなら
jp_2: あとハをやより心したいに

en: About the Gift bestowed from Heaven after Tsukihi discerns the sincere mind:
ro: shinjitsu no kokoro Tsukihi ga misadamete   ten yori watasu atae naru no wa

jp_2: 天よりわたすあたゑなるのわ

en: Never take it as a trivial matter. The intention of Heaven is profound.

jp_1: 一寸したる事とハさらにをもうなよ
jp_2: 天よりふかいをもハくがある

en: To explain what this talk is about: I shall purify the minds of those in Kara and Tenjiku.

jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事であろふなら
jp_2: からてんじくも心すまして

en: How will those minds be purified? Tsukihi will rush out to places near and far.
ro: kono kokoro doshite sumasu koto naraba   Tsukihi tobidete atchi kotchi to
jp_1: この心どふしてすます事ならば
jp_2: 月日とびでゝあゝちこゝちと

en: Step by step, Tsukihi will enter bodies and begin free and unlimited workings.
ro: dandan to Tsukihi tainai irikonde   juyojizai o shite kakaru de na
jp_1: たん／＼と月日たいない入こんで
jp_2: ぢうよぢざいをしてかゝるでな

en: Then, however boastful those of Kara may be, they will never rival those in Nihon.
ro: shitaru nara nanbo kara ya to yuta tote   nihon no mono ni kore wa kanawan
jp_1: したるならなんぼからやとゆうたとて
jp_2: にほんのものにこれハかなわん

en: Be convinced by the things that appear day by day. There is no knowing when or what you will hear.

jp_1: にち／＼にみへるところでとくしんせ
jp_2: なんどきどんなはなしきくやら

en: Whatever you hear, it was taught beforehand in the talks of Tsukihi.
ro: dono yona hanashi kiitemo saki i yori   kore wa Tsukihi no hanashi naru no ya
jp_1: どのよふなはなしきいてもさきいより
jp_2: これわ月日のはなしなるのや

en: From now on, Tsukihi will favor those in Nihon step by step. Watch!
ro: korekara wa nihon no mono wa dandan to   Tsukihi hikitate kore o mite iyo
jp_1: これからハにほんのものハたん／＼と
jp_2: 月日ひきたてこれをみていよ

en: I shall teach you everything about all things so that nothing will remain which you do not know.
ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo mina oshie   shiran koto owa nai yoni suru
jp_1: なにもかもどのよな事もみなをしへ
jp_2: しらん事をハないよふにする

en: When the pillar is set up in Nihon, you shall no longer fall ill, die, or become weakened.
ro: nihon niwa hashira o tateta koto naraba   yamazu shinazu ni yowari naki yoni
jp_1: にほんにハはしらをたてた事ならば
jp_2: やまずしなすによハりなきよに

en: Until now, those of Kara have rampantly done as they pleased. This time, I shall give them a return.
ro: imamade wa kara ya to yute habikarite   mamani shite ita kondo kayashi o
jp_1: いまゝでハからやとゆうてはびかりて
jp_2: まゝにしていたこんどかやしを

en: By this talk, I do not tell anyone to do anything. I, Tsukihi, shall rush out and do as I please.
ro: kono hanashi tare ni dose to yu de nashi   Tsukihi tobidete mamani suru nari
jp_1: このはなしたれにどふせとゆうでなし
jp_2: 月日とびでゝまゝにするなり

en: Even until now, everyone has known the moon and the sun, but there is no one who knows the true origin.
ro: koremade mo Tsukihi o shiran mono wa nai   naredo honmoto shirita mono nashi
jp_1: これまでも月日をしらんものハない
jp_2: なれとほんもとしりたものなし

en: This time, I shall teach the truth of all matters and hasten to save you.
ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   yute kikashite tasuke isogu de
jp_1: このたびハどのよな事もしんぢつを
jp_2: ゆうてきかしてたすけいそぐで

en: To say when this will come: it will come as soon as the weeding of the rice fields is done.
ro: kono higara itsu goro naru to yu naraba   ta no shuri o shimai shidai ni
jp_1: このひがらいつころなるとゆうならば
jp_2: たあのしゆりをしまいしだいに

en: Then, a marvelous path will open, and the performers of the Service will all assemble.

jp_1: それからハなにかめづらしみちになる
jp_2: つとめのにんぢうみなよりてくる

en: Step by step and day by day, the mind will become spirited. What a rich harvest will appear in Yamato!
ro: dandan to nichinichi kokoro isamu de na   nanto Yamato wa erai honen
jp_1: たん／＼とにち／＼心いさむでな
jp_2: なんとやまとハゑらいほふねん

en: Day by day, hasten to begin the Service. You will escape any danger whatever.
ro: nichinichi ni hayaku Tsutome o sekikome yo   ika naru nan mo mina nogareru de
jp_1: にち／＼にはやくつとめをせきこめよ
jp_2: いかなるなんもみなのがれるで

en: However serious your illness may be, you will all be saved by the Service done single-heartedly.
ro: dono yona mutsukashiku naru yamai demo   Tsutome ichijo de mina tasukaru de
jp_1: とのよふなむつかしくなるやまいでも
jp_2: つとめ一ぢよてみなたすかるで

en: As to the Service to be done, it is none other than the Service of the Kanrodai.
ro: Tsutome demo doyu Tsutome suru naraba   Kanrodai no Tsutome ichijo
jp_1: つとめでもどふゆうつとめするならば
jp_2: かんろふだいのつとめいちゞよ

en: What do you think this Stand is? It is the Parent of Nihon.

jp_1: このたいをどふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: これにいほんのをやであるぞや

en: If you but sincerely think this to be true, Tsukihi will discern it and assure anything whatever.
ro: kore saika makoto shinjitsu omou nara   Tsukihi miwakete mina hikiukeru
jp_1: これさいかまことしんぢつをもうなら
jp_2: 月日みハけてみなひきうける

en: Since I, Tsukihi, give My assurance, there will not be even a single error in a thousand.

jp_2: せんに一つもちがう事なし

en: How are you hearing this talk? It is about the Service of the Kanrodai.
ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni kiite iru   Kanrodai no Tsutome naru no wa
jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事にきいている
jp_2: かんろふだいのつとめなるのわ

jp_1: 一寸したるつとめなるとハをもうなよ
jp_2: 三十六人にんがほしいで

jp_2: かぐらづとめの人ぢうほしいで

jp_2: とりつぎの人しかとたのむで

ro: kono dai o koshirae yo tote dandan ni   Tsukihi ninju no moyo suru nari
jp_1: このだいをこしらゑよとてたん／＼に
jp_2: 月日人ぢうのもよふするなり

jp_2: そのまゝだいもでける事やで

en: To explain what this path is about: Tsukihi will teach them the hand movements of the Service, and then,

jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事であるならば
jp_2: 月日つとめのてゑをふしへて

jp_2: つれてゞたならひとりでけるで

jp_1: これさいかたしかにでけた事ならば
jp_2: 月々つとめちがう事なし

en: If only the Service is done without error, the Gift of Heaven, also, will be given without fail.

jp_1: つとめさいちがハんよふになあたなら
jp_2: 天のあたゑもちがう事なし

jp_2: みちであるぞやみなしやんせよ

jp_2: 月日みわけてみなひきよせる

en: No matter where these people may be, Tsukihi will do this by free and unlimited workings.

jp_1: どのよふなところのものとゆうたとて
jp_2: 月日ぢうよふしてみせるでな

jp_2: どんな事でもでけん事なし

jp_2: 月日をしへん事わないぞや

en: Though Tsukihi has already taught you most everything step by step,

jp_2: をしゑてきたる事であれども

en: This time, I shall teach you further all the truths yet unknown to you.
ro: konotabi wa mata sono ue no shiran koto   nanimo shinjitsu mina yute kikasu

jp_2: なにもしんぢつみなゆてきかす

en: Until now, those of Kara have been boastfully thriving, but they also have been taught by Tsukihi.

jp_2: これも月日がをしへきたるで

en: This time, returning to the origin, Tsukihi will clearly reveal the whole root of the tree.

jp_2: しりたるならばどこいいたとて

jp_2: にんけんもとをこれせかゑぢうへ

jp_2: しらしたるならはなしハかるで

en: No matter how I strive to explain My teachings, unless I teach you the origin...

jp_2: もとをしらしてをかん事にハ

en: If only I have taught you the origin clearly, you will understand everything I say.

jp_1: もとさいかしいかりゆうてをいたなら
jp_2: なにをゆうてもみなきゝハける

en: The earth and heaven of this world is your real Parent. Out of this, human beings were born.

jp_1: このよふのぢいと天とハぢつのをや
jp_2: それよりでけたにんけんである

en: From now on, I shall tell you solely of things unknown to both Kara and Nihon. Listen closely!
ro: korekara wa kara mo nihon mo shiran koto   bakari yu zo ya shikato kiku nari

jp_2: ばかりゆうぞやしかときくなり

en: I wish to train you all in everything so that you need not say that you do not know.

jp_1: どのよふな事もしらんとゆハんよふ
jp_2: みな一れつにしこみたいから

jp_2: をゝくの人のむねのうちをば

en: How can I have you understand My mind? I so desire that your minds be purified quickly.

jp_1: この心どふしたならばわかるやら
jp_2: どふどはやくにこれをわけたい

en: When all the world is truly purified from the innermost heart, it will be Tsukihi's delight.

jp_2: わかりたならば月日たのしみ

en: When all humankind is purified from the innermost heart, Tsukihi will, then,

jp_2: わかりたならば月日それより

en: Make your minds spirited step by step and day by day, and teach joyousness to all of you.

jp_2: よふきづくめをみなにをしへて

jp_1: せかいぢうをふくの人のむねのうち
jp_2: みなすましたる事であるなら

en: Then the mind of Tsukihi will spring forth spiritedly, and I shall teach you everything about all matters.

jp_2: どんな事でもみなをしゑるで

en: Tsukihi desires to teach the truth of everything to all humankind equally.

jp_2: みな一れつにをしゑたいのや

en: Tsukihi desires you to have a sincere mind because I wish to train you in all matters.

jp_1: しんぢつの心がほしい月日にわ
jp_2: どんな事でもしこみたいから

jp_2: これからさきのよろづみちすじ

jp_2: ひがちかづけばひとりみへるで

jp_2: なにかよろづハ月日ていりや

jp_2: どんなもよふをするやしれんで

jp_2: かんろふだいのもよふばかりを

en: In your days, if a disorder comes to the body, know that it is the care of Tsukihi.
ro: nichinichi ni minouchi sawari tsuita nara   kore wa Tsukihi no teiri naru ka yo
jp_1: にち／＼にみのうちさハりついたなら
jp_2: これハ月日のていりなるかよ

en: Looking throughout the world step by step, I feel pity for you, so I desire to make changes.
ro: dandan to misumasu tokoro sekaiju   kinodoku na kara monku kaetai
jp_1: だん／＼とみすますところせかいぢう
jp_2: きのどくなからもんくかへたい

en: Ponder: whatever is said by mouth, if there is no sure proof, it will not do.
ro: shiyan seyo kuchi de nani goto yuta tote   tashikana shoko nakuba ikan de
jp_1: しやんせよくちでなに事ゆうたとて
jp_2: たしかなしよこなくばいかんで

en: This is proof: Tsukihi has entered this body and gives directions freely and unlimitedly.
ro: Tsukihi yori tainai yori mo irikonde   juyojizai no sashizu shoko ya
jp_1: 月日よりたいないよりも入こんで
jp_2: ぢうよぢざいのさしずしよこや

en: Because of this, I begin things, speaking solely about that which has never existed anywhere.
ro: soreyue ni imamade doko ni nai koto o   bakari yuute hajime kakeru de
jp_1: それゆへにいまゝでどこにない事を
jp_2: ばかりゆううてはじめかけるで

en: Though I speak solely about things which have never existed, they are all the teachings of Tsukihi.
ro: imamade mo nai koto bakari yu no mo na   kore mo Tsukihi no mina oshie ya de
jp_1: いまゝでもない事ばかりゆうのもな
jp_2: これも月日のみなをしへやで

en: The matter of the Kanrodai at this time is also that which has been unknown before.
ro: konotabi no Kanrodai to yu no mo na   kore mo imamade shiran koto ya de
jp_1: このたびのかんろふだいとゆうのもな
jp_2: これもいまゝでしらん事やで

en: Whatever is said, it is all by Tsukihi. I speak because I desire to teach you things unknown.
ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo mina Tsukihi   shiran koto oba oshietai kara
jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうのもみな月日
jp_2: しらん事をばをしゑたいから

en: That I place the Kanrodai in this Residence is the proof that I began human beings.
ro: kono yashiki Kanrodai o sueru no wa   ningen hajime kaketa shoko
jp_1: このやしきかんろふだいをすへるのハ
jp_2: にんけんはじめかけたしよこふ

en: Beginning everything in this way, I shall purify the minds of the whole world.
ro: nani goto mo mina kono tori hajime kake   sekaiju no kokoro sumasuru
jp_1: なに事もみなこのとふりはちめかけ
jp_2: せかいぢううの心すまする

en: Day by day, I shall make every effort solely for the preparations to make everyone in the world spirited.
ro: nichinichi ni nandemo sekai ichiretsu o   isameru moyo bakari suru zo ya
jp_1: にち／＼になんでもせかい一れつを
jp_2: いさめるもよふばかりするぞや

en: As the minds of the world are spirited step by step, the growth of all crops, also, will be spirited.
ro: dandan to sekai no kokoro isamu nara   ryuke morotomo mina isami deru
jp_1: だん／＼とせかいの心いさむなら
jp_2: りうけもろともみないさみでる

en: To explain how these minds are to be spirited: Tsukihi will go forth, taking My workers along.
ro: kono kokoro doshite isamu koto naraba   Tsukihi ninsoku tsurete deru zo ya
jp_1: この心どふしていさむ事ならば
jp_2: 月日にんそくつれてゞるぞや

en: Until then, you will all hear of various things here and there and one after another.
ro: soremade ni atchi kotchi to dono yona   hanashi dandan mina kiku de aro
jp_1: それまでにあゝちこふちとどのよふな
jp_2: はなしだん／＼みなきくであろ

en: Whatever you hear, I told of it all beforehand. Ponder over it.
ro: dono yona hanashi kiku no mo mina saki i   yute aru zo ya shiyan shite miyo
jp_1: どのよふなはなしきくのもみなさきい
jp_2: ゆうてあるぞやしやんしてみよ

en: You may be wondering what Tsukihi is speaking about step by step, but the future is promising.
ro: Tsukihi niwa nani o dandan yuwareru to   omou de aro saki no tanoshimi
jp_1: 月日にハなにをだん／＼ゆハれると
jp_2: をもうてあろをさきのたのしみ

en: Above all, the mind of Tsukihi desires a Divine Record for Nihon.
ro: nani goto mo Tsukihi no kokoro omou niwa   nihon ni Koki hoshii koto kara
jp_1: なに事も月日の心をもうにわ
jp_2: にほんにこふきほしい事から

en: If the Divine Record is surely made in Nihon and spread widely, Kara will do as I wish.
ro: nihon nimo Koki o tashika koshiraete   sore hirometara kara wa mama nari
jp_1: にほんにもこふきをたしかこしらへて
jp_2: それひろめたらからハまゝなり

en: What are you all thinking of this talk? It concerns all of you, the people of Nihon.
ro: kono hanashi nanto omote mina no mono   nihon no mono wa mina waga koto ya
jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてみなのもの
jp_2: にほんのものハみなわが事や

en: Unaware of this, what are you in the high places thinking? You cannot understand My heart. Oh, the regret of Tsukihi...
ro: sore shirazu nanto omote kami taru wa   mune ga wakaran Tsukihi zannen
jp_1: それしらずなんとをもふて上たるハ
jp_2: むねがわからん月日さんねん

en: Whatever Divine Record is accomplished at this place, it will be a treasure for Nihon.
ro: kono tokoro dono yona Koki shitaru tomo   kore wa nihon no takara naru zo ya
jp_1: このところどのよなこふきしたるとも
jp_2: これハにほんのたからなるぞや

en: All humankind, settle your minds and ponder. Prepare quickly to wait for the Divine Record.
ro: ichiretsu no kokoro sadamete shiyan seyo   hayaku Koki o matsu yoni seyo
jp_1: 一れつの心さだめてしやんせよ
jp_2: はやくこふきをまつよふにせよ

en: When the true Divine Record has been accomplished, Tsukihi will spread everything whatever.
ro: shinjitsu no Koki ga deketa koto naraba   donna koto demo Tsukihi hiromeru
jp_1: しんぢつのこふきがでけた事ならば
jp_2: どんな事でも月日ひろめる

en: Though I say that Tsukihi will spread it, the minds of all of you may not understand.
ro: Tsukihi yori hirome o suru to yuta tote   mina no kokoro wa shochi dekemai
jp_1: 月日よりひろめをするとゆうたとて
jp_2: みなの心ハしよちでけまい

en: In this regard, I firmly request you, My inter-mediaries. Please comply.
ro: soreyue ni toritsugi yori ni shikkari to   tanomi oku kara shochi shite iyo
jp_1: それゆへにとりつきよりにしいかりと
jp_2: たのみをくからしよちしていよ

en: When the day of the appointed time comes, there will be no knowing when or where Tsukihi will go.
ro: kono higara kokugen kitaru koto naraba   nandoki Tsukihi doko i iku yara
jp_1: このひがらこくけんきたる事ならば
jp_2: なんどき月日どこいゝくやら

en: Day by day, calm your minds firmly, My intermediaries, and begin quickly.
ro: nichinichi ni toritsugi no hito shikkari to   kokoro shizumete hayaku kakare yo
jp_1: にち／＼にとりつぎの人しいかりと
jp_2: 心しづめてはやくかゝれよ

en: What are all of you thinking of this path? It is not easy to understand it.
ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni mina no mono   omote iru yara choto ni wakaran
jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事にみなのもの
jp_2: をもているやら一寸にわからん

en: By all means, Tsukihi will complete this path, holding fast to the mind of sincerity.
ro: Tsukihi niwa nandemo kademo shinjitsu o   kokoro shikkari torinukeru de
jp_1: 月日にハなんでもかでもしんぢつを
jp_2: 心しいかりとふりぬけるで

en: When this path has reached the high places, I shall do My free and unlimited workings.
ro: kono michi o kami e nuketaru koto naraba   juyojizai no hataraki o suru
jp_1: このみちを上ゑぬけたる事ならば
jp_2: ぢうよぢざいのはたらきをする

en: When Tsukihi begins the workings, however strongly a person may oppose Me,
ro: Tsukihi yori kono hataraki o shikaketara   ikana goteki taru to yutemo
jp_1: 月日よりこのはたらきをしかけたら
jp_2: いかなこふてきたるとゆうても

en: He will truly understand and be purified in mind, and will lean on the Parent in all matters.
ro: kokoro yori shinjitsu wakari sumikirite   donna koto demo Oya ni motareru
jp_1: 心よりしんぢつハかりすみきりて
jp_2: とんな事でもをやにもたれる

en: Hereafter, I shall set out to make the whole world brim with joy.
ro: konosaki wa sekaiju wa dokomade mo   yokizukume ni mina shite kakaru
jp_1: このさきハせかへぢううハどこまでも
jp_2: よふきづくめにみなしてかゝる

en: Take each course of this path as your own matter and ponder.
ro: dandan to kono michisuji no yotai wa   mina waga koto to omote shiyan se
jp_1: たん／＼とこのみちすじのよふたいハ
jp_2: みなハが事とをもてしやんせ

en: If a severe tightening of the chest comes upon you, it is the hastening of the mind of Tsukihi.
ro: muna saki e kibishiku tsukae kitaru nara   Tsukihi no kokoro sekikomi de aru
jp_1: むなさきへきびしくつかへきたるなら
jp_2: 月日の心せきこみである

en: Hereafter, all of you may receive disorders of the body step by step.
ro: konosaki wa ichiretsu naru ni dandan to   minouchi sawari mina tsuku de aro
jp_1: このさきハ一れつなるにだん／＼と
jp_2: みのうちさハりみなつくであろ

en: Whatever disorder you may receive, do not worry, for there is a great intention in the mind of Tsukihi.
ro: dono yona sawari tsuitemo anjina yo   Tsukihi no kokoro erai omowaku
jp_1: どのよふなさハりついてもあんぢなよ
jp_2: 月日の心ゑらいをもわく

en: Though a disorder may come to the body, I am making a distinction in each of your minds.
ro: minouchi ni sawari tsuitemo meme no   kokoro sorezore mina wakeru de na
jp_1: みのうちにさハりついてもめへ／＼の
jp_2: 心それ／＼みなわけるでな

en: I shall distinguish those thoughts which are sincere from those which are concerned with only the self.
ro: shinjitsu ni omou kokoro to meme no   shiyan bakari o omoi iru to o
jp_1: しんぢつにをもう心とめゑ／＼の
jp_2: しやんばかりをふもいゝるとを

en: Whatever kind of mind you may have, Tsukihi will at this time make the distinction clear.
ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona kokoro iru mono mo   konotabi shikato wakete miseru de
jp_1: 月日にハどのよな心いるものも
jp_2: このたびしかとわけてみせるで

en: Tsukihi clearly sees what kind of mind you have and will at this time make the distinction in all.
ro: dono yona kokoro mo shikato mite iru de   Tsukihi konotabi mina wakeru de na
jp_1: どのよふな心もしかとみているで
jp_2: 月日このたびみなわけるでな

en: Words of flattery are unwanted. Tsukihi looks for the sincerity of the mind.
ro: kuchi saki no tsuisho bakari wa iran mono   kokoro no makoto Tsukihi mite iru
jp_1: 口さきのついしよばかりハいらんもの
jp_2: 心のまこと月日みている

en: Even until now, though I have given you My teachings in various talks, the real truth has not been seen.
ro: koremade mo iroiro hanashi toitaredo   honshinjitsu ga miete nai no de
jp_1: これまでもいろ／＼はなしといたれど
jp_2: ほんしんぢつがみゑてないので

en: Today, whatever talks I may give, I shall never tell you anything that will become false.
ro: kyonohi wa nanino hanashi o shitaru tomo   chigau yo naru koto wa yuwanedo
jp_1: けふの日ハなにのはなしをしたるとも
jp_2: ちがうよふなる事ハゆハねど

en: What Tsukihi has once said will never become false through all time.
ro: Tsukihi yori ichido yute oita nara   itsu ni naritemo chigau koto nashi
jp_1: 月日より一どふゆうてをいたなら
jp_2: いつになりてもちがう事なし

en: Unaware of this, even all of you close to Me think My words to be worldly common.
ro: sore shirazu soba no kokoro wa tare nitemo   sekainami naru yoni omote
jp_1: それしらすそばの心ハたれにても
jp_2: せかいなみなるよふにをもふて

en: From your suffering at this time, be convinced, you and all the others.
ro: konotabi no nayamu tokoro de tokushin se   mina no kokoro mo meme kokoro mo
jp_1: このたびのなやむところでとくしんせ
jp_2: みなの心もめゑ／＼心も

en: There is no error in My free and unlimited workings, but there must be understanding in everyone's mind.
ro: kono koto o juyojizai wa chigawanedo   mina no kokoro ni shochi nakeneba
jp_1: この事をぢうよぢざいハちがハねど
jp_2: みなの心にしよちなけねば

en: When understanding comes to all of you, Tsukihi will assuredly save you.
ro: ichiretsu ni shochi o shitaru koto naraba   Tsukihi ukeyote tashika tasukeru
jp_1: 一れつにしよちをしたる事ならば
jp_2: 月日うけよてたしかたすける

en: What do you think of this salvation? You will be able to go out of doors in three days.
ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   mikka me niwa soto i deru yo
jp_1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: 三かめへにハそといでるよふ

en: Even until now, though I called Myself Tsukihi and gave you My teachings step by step,
ro: koremade mo Tsukihi to yute dandan to   hanashi mo toite kitaru naredomo
jp_1: これまでも月日とゆうてだん／＼と
jp_2: はなしもといてきたるなれども

en: Still, perhaps you cannot understand the core matter. At this time, I shall reveal all things whatever.
ro: mada shin no tokoro wa sarani wakarumai   konotabi donna koto mo arawasu
jp_1: まだしんのところハさらにハかるまい
jp_2: このたびどんな事もあらわす

en: Even with My talks, if I give them at the same place, you might take them as being from a human mind.
ro: hanashi demo onashi tokoro de yu naraba   nando ningen gokoro naru yo
jp_1: はなしでもをなしところでゆうならば
jp_2: なんどにんけん心なるよふ

en: So as not to cause you such pitiful thoughts, I shall give My talks at a different place this time.
ro: mina no mono omou kokoro wa kinodoku ya   konotabi tokoro kaete hanashi o
jp_1: みなのものをもう心ハきのどくや
jp_2: このたびところかへてはなしを

en: On hearing it, be convinced, whoever you may be: the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi always work in this way.
ro: kore kiite ikana mono demo tokushin se   Tsukihi juyo mina kono dori
jp_1: これきいていかなものでもとくしんせ
jp_2: 月日ぢうよふみなこのどふり

en: Tsukihi enters this body and speaks freely and unrestrictedly, but perhaps you are not convinced of it.
ro: tainai e Tsukihi irikomi juyo o   yute iredomo shochi arumai
jp_1: たいないへ月日入こみぢうよふを
jp_2: ゆうていれどもしよちあるまい

en: Henceforth, after giving you as much notice step by step as I am able, I shall begin.
ro: konosaki wa seeippai ni dandan to   kotowarita ue kakaru koto nari
jp_1: このさきハせゑいゝバいにたん／＼と
jp_2: ことハりたゆへかゝる事なり

en: Though I say Tsukihi makes things manifest, it is only after giving every notice of it step by step.
ro: Tsukihi yori araware deru to yuta tote   dandan nanimo kotowarita ue
jp_1: 月日よりあらハれでるとゆうたとて
jp_2: たん／＼なにもことわりたゆへ

en: You are thinking that the suffering at this time is from illness, but the thought is wrong.
ro: konotabi no nayamite iru o yamai ya to   omote iru no wa kore wa chigau de
jp_1: このたびのなやみているをやまいやと
jp_2: をもているのハこれハちがうで

en: Never think it is from illness or the like, but from the desire for you to know the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi.
ro: kore bakari yamai nazo towa omouna yo   Tsukihi juyo shirashitai yue
jp_1: こればかりやまいなぞとハをもうなよ
jp_2: 月日ぢうよふしらしたいゆへ

en: I inform you of all matters whatever because I have an intention for the future.
ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo shirasuru wa   saki no omowaku aru kara no koto
jp_1: なにもかもとのよな事もしらするハ
jp_2: さきのをもわくあるからの事

en: To explain what this talk is about: Tsukihi will take charge of everything in the future.
ro: kono hanashi doyu koto de aru naraba   saki no yorozu wa Tsukihi hikiuke
jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事てあるならば
jp_2: さきのよろづハ月日ひきうけ

en: I, Tsukihi, will take charge because she is causally related to the origin.
ro: Tsukihi yori hikiuke suru to yu no mo na   moto no innen aru kara no koto
jp_1: 月日よりひきうけするとゆうのもな
jp_2: もとのいんねんあるからの事

en: To explain what the causality is about: she is an instrument of origin in the beginning of human beings.
ro: innen mo doyu koto de aru naraba   ningen hajime moto no dogu ya
jp_1: いんねんもどふゆう事であるならば
jp_2: にんけんはぢめもとのどふぐや

en: Tsukihi will train this person in all matters and bring about marvelous salvation.
ro: kono mono ni Tsukihi yorozu no shikomi suru   sore de mezurashi tasuke suru no ya
jp_1: このものに月日よろづのしこみする
jp_2: それでめづらしたすけるのや

en: Do not think of this lightly. It will become the Divine Record of Nihon.
ro: kono koto wa chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   kore wa nihon no Koki naru no ya
jp_1: この事わ一寸事やとをもうなよ
jp_2: これハにほんのこふきなるのや

en: If you had only known earlier that she should have been returned home to be saved completely...
ro: are inde kora hodo nanimo sukiyaka ni   tasukaru koto o hayaku shiritara
jp_1: あれいんでこらほどなにもすきやかに
jp_2: たすかる事をはやくしりたら

en: Unaware of it, you would not return her, but tried to care for her there.
ro: sore shirazu dodo inasazu kono toko de   yojo sashite okoto omota de
jp_1: それしらずどふどいなさすこのとこで
jp_2: よふぢよさしてをことをもたで

en: If you had known this earlier, there would have been no suffering or anxiety.
ro: konna koto hayaku shiritaru koto naraba   setsunami mo nashi shinpai mo nashi
jp_1: こんな事はやくしりたる事ならば
jp_2: せつなみもなししんバいもなし

en: Because you humans are shallow-minded, you did not heed the words of Tsukihi.
ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   Tsukihi yuwareru koto o somuita
jp_1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
jp_2: 月日ゆハれる事をそむいた

en: From now on, you must firmly lean on Tsukihi in all matters whatever.
ro: korekara wa donna koto demo Tsukihi niwa   motare tsukaneba naran koto ya de
jp_1: これからハどんな事でも月日にハ
jp_2: もたれつかねばならん事やで

en: In doing anything, so long as you lean on Tsukihi, there will be no danger.
ro: dono yona koto o suru nimo Tsukihi ni wa   motarete ireba abunaki wa nai
jp_1: どのよふな事をするにも月日にて
jp_2: もたれていればあふなけハない

en: Your unawareness of such a splendid path as this has led to your remorse.
ro: kono yona kekko naru no michisuji o   shirazu ni ita ga ato no kokwai
jp_1: このよふなけへこふなるのみちすしを
jp_2: しらすにいたがあとのこふくハい

en: Hereafter, whatever you are told, you should never go against what Tsukihi says.
ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto o yuwaretemo   Tsukihi yuwareru koto wa somukan
jp_1: このさきハどのよな事をゆハれても
jp_2: 月日ゆハれる事ハそむかん

en: The chest of the one taken as a shrine by Tsukihi is blocked. What do you think of it?
ro: Tsukihi yori yashiro to naru no muna saki no   tsukaete aru o nanto omou zo
jp_1: 月日よりやしろとなるのむなさきの
jp_2: つかゑてあるをなんとをもうぞ

en: Do not think of this blocking as being ordinary. The mind of Tsukihi is truly anxious.
ro: kono tsukae hitonami naru to omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro makoto shinpai
jp_1: このつかへ人なみなるとをもうなよ

en: Unaware of this, all of you everywhere are doing your own work only with self-centered thoughts.
ro: sore shirazu mina ichiretsu wa meme ni   waga mi shiyan de shigoto bakari o
jp_1: それしらずみな一れつハめへ／＼に
jp_2: わがみしやんでしことばかりを

en: Tsukihi sees all paths whatever, but no one in the world thinks about it.
ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona michi mo miete aru   sekaiju wa sore o omowazu
jp_1: 月日にハどのよなみちもみへてある
jp_2: せかいぢううハそれをふもハす

en: Ponder over this path, all My children! There is no knowing what kind of path will appear.
ro: kono michi o kodomo ichiretsu shiyan seyo   dono yona michi ga aru ya shiren de
jp_1: このみちをこども一れつしやんせよ
jp_2: どのよなみちがあるやしれんで

en: I shall inform you of everything in advance. Make sure you will not be remorseful later.
ro: dono yona koto demo saki e shirashi oku   ato de kokwai naki yoni seyo
jp_1: どのよふな事でもさきへしらしをく
jp_2: あとでこふくハいなきよふにせよ

en: All of you may be wondering why I say such things. It is from My love for My children.
ro: konna koto nani o yu ya to mina no mono   omou de aro kodomo kawaii
jp_1: こんな事なにをゆうやとみなのもの
jp_2: をもうであろふこどもかハいゝ

en: All My many children in the world, is there not a way I can make you understand from your innermost heart?
ro: sekaiju oku no kodomo mune no uchi   wakaru moyo ga kore wa nai ka yo
jp_1: せかいぢうをふくの子共むねのうち

jp_2: みちをあんぢているもよふから

jp_2: これをかならすうそとをもうな

jp_2: あしきのよふな事わせんぞや

jp_2: そこでかゝりたしごとなるぞや

jp_2: よふきつくめの心なるよふ

jp_1: この心どふしてなるとをもうかな
jp_2: 月日たいない入こんだなら

en: Day by day, the mind will be spirited of itself and become the mind filled with joy.

jp_2: よふきづくめの心なるよふ

jp_2: よふきつくめにしてかゝるでな

jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
jp_2: たすけ一ぢよのもよふばかりを

jp_2: なにをゆうてもみなしよちせよ

jp_1: ことしから七十ねんハふう／＼とも
jp_2: やまずよハらすくらす事なら

en: There can perhaps be no greater happiness. Look forward to it as coming true.

jp_1: それよりのたのしみなるハあるまいな
jp_2: これをまことにたのしゆんでいよ

jp_2: ばかりゆうぞやしよちしてきけ

jp_2: さきをみていよみなまことやで

jp_1: なにぶんにめづらし事をするからハ
jp_2: いかなはなしもない事ばかり

jp_2: さきをみていよみゑるふしぎや

jp_2: これからさきハ心だのしみ

en: I give you these talks repeatedly because they are to be the Divine Record for eternity.

jp_2: これハまつたいこふきなるのや

jp_2: とんな事をもはなしするのハ

jp_1: とのような事もたん／＼しらしたさ
jp_2: にほんのこふきみなこしらゑる

jp_1: このよふのはじまりたしハやまとにて
jp_2: やまべこふりのしよやしきなり

jp_2: にんけんはじめどふくみへるで

jp_2: くにさづちいと月よみとなり

jp_2: なにかよろづをしこむもよふを

jp_2: 事をするのもみな月日なり

jp_1: とのよふな事をゆうにもみな月日
jp_2: そばなるものハまねをしてみよ

jp_2: ほんしんぢつをゆうた事なし

jp_2: ゆハねばならんよふになるから

jp_2: 月日のをもうよふにゆうのや

en: Whenever you return, never think that it is caused by your individual minds.

jp_1: なんどきにかいりてきてもめへ／＼の
jp_2: 心あるとハさらにをもうな

jp_2: さしてかいるでこれをみていよ

jp_1: このそふぢうちもせかいもへだてない
jp_2: めゑ／＼の心みなあらわすで

jp_1: いまゝでわ神のさんねん山／＼と
jp_2: むねにほこりがつもりあれども

jp_2: どのよな事もゆうにゆハれん

en: This time, Tsukihi truly cannot bear to look on. I shall manifest all things whatever.

jp_1: このたびハ月日しんぢつみかねるで
jp_2: どのよな事もみなあらハすで

jp_2: 月日の心ばかりなるぞや

en: This regret in the mind of Tsukihi today: know that it is not a small matter.

jp_2: ことハりてあるこれがしよちか

en: Even until now, though I have repeatedly appealed to you about the regret of Tsukihi,

en: There is no one in the world who knows. Look at the regret in the mind of Tsukihi!

jp_2: たれかきゝわけするものハない

jp_2: いかな事をばゆうやしろまい

jp_2: まこときのどくをもていれども

en: The time when things will be seen: this cannot be known. The mind of Tsukihi is filled to the brim.

jp_1: なんときにみゑる事やらこれしれん
jp_2: 月日の心つみきりてある

en: Great is the worry in the mind of Tsukihi. Yet you close to Me know nothing of it.

jp_2: そばなるものハなにもしらずに

jp_2: みへたるならばもんくかハるぞ

en: To God, who began this world, all things whatever are seen.

jp_2: とのよな事もみなみゑてある

en: This time, as all matters are brimming over, there is no time at all to waver.

jp_2: もふさしぬきハさらにてけんで

en: Until now, no matter what I had said to you, I have still been holding back.

jp_2: またちいくりとしたるなれども

en: Today, do not be off your guard even to look aside! There is no knowing what will happen or when.

jp_2: なんどきとんな事があるやら

jp_2: さあみゑてきた心いさむで

jp_2: とんなものでもよふきつくめや

jp_2: しよちしてくれ月日たのみや

en: From today, I shall begin to speak of marvelous things. Perhaps you have no idea of what I shall say.

jp_2: なにをゆうとも一寸にしれまい
