ro: kono hanashi nani o yutemo somukuna yo   Kami no onowaku erai koto ya de
jp_1: このはなしなにをゆうてもそむくなよ
jp_2: 神のをもわくゑらい事やで

en: My talks from now will be on the way to clear away the mountainous regret of God.
ro: korekara no ato naru hanashi yamayama no   Kami no zannen harasu moyo o
jp_1: これからのあとなるはなし山／＼の
jp_2: 神のさんねんはらすもよふを

en: Hereafter, however serious an illness there may be, I shall save you all by the Breath and the Hand Dance.
ro: konosaki wa nanbo mutsukashi yamai demo   Iki to Teodori mina tasukeru de
jp_1: このさきハなんほむつかしやまいても
jp_2: いきとてをどりみなたすけるで

en: However serious an illness there may be, never say that it will not be cured.
ro: dono yona mutsukashiku naru yamai demo   kore naoran to yu de nai zo ya
jp_1: どのよふなむつかしくなるやまいでも
jp_2: これなをらんとゆうでないぞや

en: Until today, as the day of the appointed time had not arrived, things were not all as I had said.
ro: kyomade wa higara kokugen kitaran de   nanika chigai mo arita naredomo
jp_1: けふまでわひがらこくけんきたらんで
jp_2: なにかちがいもありたなれとも

en: But now, I shall give you My teachings on every matter step by step. In nothing shall there be an error.
ro: dandan to ikana koto omo toite oku   donna koto demo chigau koto nashi
jp_1: だん／＼といかな事をもといてをく
jp_2: どんな事てもちがう事なし

en: Though the course of your path until now has truly been one of hardship,
ro: koremade no michi no sugara to yu mono wa   makoto nanju na michi de aredomo
jp_1: これまてのみちのすがらとゆうものハ
jp_2: まことなんぢうなみちであれとも

en: In the path ahead, everything will raise your spirits. What a marvelous path it will be!
ro: konosaki no michi wa nandemo ki ga isamu   donna mezurashi michi ga aru yara
jp_1: このさきのみちハなんてもきがいさむ
jp_2: どんなめつらしみちがあるやら

en: Though you may see Me rush out by leaps and bounds, never be anxious of mind.
ro: tonton to tobideru koto o mita totemo   kokoro anji wa suru ya nai zo ya
jp_1: とん／＼ととびてる事をみたとても
jp_2: 心あんちハするやないぞや

en: Afterward, Tsukihi will take all matters in hand and will assure you a life full of joy everlasting.
ro: ato naru wa yorozu Tsukihi ga hikiukete   itsuitsu made mo yokizukume ni
jp_1: あとなるハよろづ月日がひきうけて
jp_2: いつ／＼までもよふきつくめに

en: Until now, whatever talks I had given you, you thought they were about the future far away.
ro: imamade wa nani yono hanashi shitaru tomo   itsu no koto naru yoni omote
jp_1: いまゝてわなによのはなししたるとも
jp_2: いつの事なるよふにをもふて

en: But, lo, how frightful! It appears even as you hear of it. You cannot be off your guard in anything.
ro: yare kowaya kiku yori hayaku mo mieta   donna koto demo yudan deken de
jp_1: やれこわやきくよりはやくもふみへた
jp_2: どんな事てもゆたんでけんで

en: Hereafter, I shall make your minds spirited day by day. All things will be just as I say.
ro: konosaki o nichinichi kokoro isameru de   donna koto demo yueba sono mama
jp_1: このさきをにち／＼心いさめるで
jp_2: どんな事でもゆへばそのまゝ

en: However difficult things may appear, I shall save you all by the Joyous Service.
ro: dono yoni mutsukashiku yo mieta tote   Yoki-zutome de mina tasukeru de
jp_1: どのよふにむつかしくよふみへたとて
jp_2: よふきつとめてみなたすけるで

en: There is no knowing what workings I shall do from now on. In accordance with your minds, I shall do anything, however great.
ro: korekara wa dono yona shigoto suru yara na   kokoro shidai ni donna koto demo
jp_1: これからわどのよなしことするやらな
jp_2: 心したいにとんな事でも

en: Tsukihi will clear away all the mind's regret step by step, whatever it may be.
ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan kokoro zannen o   donna koto demo mina harasu de na
jp_1: 月日にわだん／＼心ざんねんを
jp_2: どんな事てもみなはらすでな

en: Whatever is said, it is all by Tsukihi. There is no knowing the workings I shall do.
ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo mina Tsukihi   ikana shigoto o suru ya shiren de
jp_1: とのよふな事をゆうのもみな月日
jp_2: いかなしごとをするやしれんで

en: Whatever appears, it is all by Tsukihi. Do not think I have a human mind.
ro: ika naru no koto ga mieru mo mina Tsukihi   ningen gokoro aru to omouna
jp_1: いかなるの事がみゑるもみな月日
jp_2: にんけん心あるとをもうな

en: From today, I shall hasten all matters. No one knows the workings I shall do.
ro: kyokara wa dono yona koto mo sekikonde   donna hataraki suru ya shiromai
jp_1: けふからハどのよな事もせきこんで
jp_2: どんなはたらきするやしろまい

en: These thoughts of Tsukihi are spoken through Her: the mouth is human, the mind is that of Tsukihi.
ro: ima naru no Tsukihi no omou koto naru wa   kuchi wa ningen kokoro Tsukihi ya
jp_1: いまなるの月日のをもう事なるわ
jp_2: くちわにんけん心月日や

en: Listen! I, Tsukihi, am borrowing Her mouth wholly, and I, Tsukihi, am lending My mind wholly.
ro: shikato kike kuchi wa Tsukihi ga mina karite   kokoro wa Tsukihi mina kashite iru
jp_1: しかときけくちハ月日がみなかりて
jp_2: 心ハ月日みなかしている

en: If you are harboring doubts over this, Tsukihi will give a full return in whatever matters.
ro: kore bakari urami aru nara dono yona   koto mo Tsukihi ga mina kayasu de na
jp_1: こればかりうらみあるならとのよふな
jp_2: 事も月日かみなかやすてな

en: Whatever is said, it is all by Tsukihi. Never is there mixed the least bit of a human mind.
ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo mina Tsukihi   ningen gokoro sarani mazen de
jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうのもみな月日
jp_2: にんけん心さらにまぜんで

en: However difficult you think matters to be, you need not worry. Tsukihi takes charge.
ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi yoni omota tote   Tsukihi hikiuke anji nai zo ya
jp_1: いかほどにむつかしよふにをもたとて
jp_2: 月日ひきうけあんちないぞや

en: All of you in the world, look forward to the path ahead. If only the regret of God is all cleared away...
ro: konosaki no michi o tanoshime ichiretsu wa   Kami no zannen harashitaru nara
jp_1: このさきのみちをたのしめ一れつわ
jp_2: 神のさんねんはらしたるなら

en: When I set out to cleanse your heart day by day, there will be none able to resist Me.
ro: nichinichi ni mune no soji ni kakaritara   donna mono demo kanau mono nashi
jp_1: にち／＼にむねのそふぢにかゝりたら
jp_2: どんなものでもかなうものなし

en: What do you think this cleansing is about? Tsukihi will enter the bodies of all.
ro: kono soji doyu koto ni omou kana   Tsukihi tainai mina irikomu de
jp_1: このそふぢどふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: 月日たいないみな入こむで

en: Where do you think this talk is about? I shall fully manifest My workings in the high places.
ro: kono hanashi doko no koto ya to omou kana   takai tokoro de mina arawasu de
jp_1: このはなしとこの事やとをもうかな
jp_2: 高いところでみなあらわすで

en: Ponder over everything Tsukihi says. There is not an error in anything I say.
ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi yu koto shiyan seyo   nani o yutemo kore chigawan de
jp_1: なにもかも月日ゆう事しやんせよ
jp_2: なにをゆうてもこれちがわんで

en: As I desire to purify the mind of everyone throughout the world, there is no knowing what Tsukihi will do.
ro: sekaiju ichiretsu kokoro sumashitasa   donna koto oba Tsukihi suru yara
jp_1: せかいぢう一れつ心すましたさ
jp_2: どんな事をば月日するやら

en: Whatever I do, it is solely from Tsukihi's single desire to save you.
ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo Tsukihi niwa   tasuketai to no ichijo bakari de
jp_1: とのよふな事をするのも月日には
jp_2: たすけたいとの一ちよはかりで

en: All of you in the world, keep your eyes firmly on the future. The cleansing of the heart will be accomplished of itself.
ro: konosaki o tashika mite iyo ichiretsu wa   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
jp_1: このさきをたしかみていよ一れつわ
jp_2: むねのそふちがひとりでけるで

en: When this cleansing is thoroughly done, I shall begin at once to prepare for the Amulet.
ro: kono soji sukiyaka shitaru koto naraba   sono mama suguni Mamori goshirae
jp_1: このそふちすきやかしたる事ならば
jp_2: そのまゝすぐにまむりごしらゑ

en: The mind of Tsukihi hastens daily for such a path to be, but no one is aware of it.
ro: kono michi o Tsukihi no kokoro nichinichi ni   sekikonde iru tare mo shirazu ni
jp_1: このみちを月日の心にち／＼に
jp_2: せきこんでいるたれもしらずに

en: If you come onto this path quickly, all of you will be spirited, whoever you may be.
ro: kono michi e hayaku tsuitaru koto naraba   donna mono demo mina isamu de na
jp_1: このみちゑはやくついたる事ならば
jp_2: どんなものでもみないさむてな

en: Do not wonder who is giving this talk. It is solely the mind of Tsukihi speaking.
ro: kono hanashi tare ga suru towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari yu no ya
jp_1: このはなしたれがするとハをもうなよ
jp_2: 月日の心はかりゆうのや

en: It is because I desire to make the truth of this world known by all means to the entire world.
ro: kono yo no shinjitsu naru o sekaiju e   doshite nari to shirashitai yue
jp_1: このよふのしんちつなるをせかへちうへ
jp_2: とふしてなりとしらしたいゆへ

en: Though until today I have let the days go by and held back in whatever matters,
ro: kyomade wa ichi nichi narito hi o nobashi   dono yona koto mo shikae iredomo
jp_1: けふまでわ一日なりとひをのばし
jp_2: とのよな事もしかゑいれども

en: This time, as the day is pressing, I cannot hold back even for a moment.
ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsumari kiru kara wa   domu shikaeru koto wa deken de
jp_1: このたびハもふひがつまりきるからハ
jp_2: どふむしかゑる事ハでけんで

en: Whatever you hear and whenever you hear of it, it is the regret and anger of Tsukihi.
ro: nandoki ni dono yona koto o kiita tote   kore wa Tsukihi no zanen rippuku
jp_1: なんどきにとのよな事をきいたとて
jp_2: これハ月日のざねんりいふく

en: To Tsukihi, everyone is My child, whoever you may be. Though I have been watching over you with nothing but love,
ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona mono mo waga ko nari   kawai bakari de mite wa iredomo
jp_1: 月日にわどのよなものもわが子なり
jp_2: かわいばかりでみてハいれども

en: And though each of you throughout the world has been pondering until now,
ro: imamade wa sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   meme shiyan o shite wa iredomo
jp_1: いまゝでハせかいぢううハ一れつに
jp_2: めゑ／＼しやんをしてわいれども

en: To My sorrow, no matter how deeply you have pondered, you have no mind to save others.
ro: nasake nai dono yoni shiyan shita totemo   hito o tasukeru kokoro nai node
jp_1: なさけないとのよにしやんしたとても
jp_2: 人をたすける心ないので

en: From now, Tsukihi requests you, everyone in the world, to replace your mind firmly.
ro: korekara wa Tsukihi tanomi ya ichiretsu wa   kokoro shikkari irekaete kure
jp_1: これからハ月日たのみや一れつわ
jp_2: 心しいかりいれかゑてくれ

en: To explain what kind of mind it is to be: it is none other than to save the world single-heartedly.
ro: kono kokoro doyu koto de aru naraba   sekai tasukeru ichijo bakari o
jp_1: この心どふゆう事であるならば
jp_2: せかいたすける一ちよばかりを

en: Hereafter, if all of you throughout the world save one another in every matter,
ro: konosaki wa sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   yorozu tagaini tasuke suru nara
jp_1: このさきハせかいぢううハ一れつに
jp_2: よろづたがいにたすけするなら

en: Know that Tsukihi will accept that mind and will provide any salvation whatever.
ro: Tsukihi nimo sono kokoro oba uketorite   donna tasuke mo suru to omoe yo
jp_1: 月日にもその心をばうけとりて
jp_2: どんなたすけもするとをもゑよ

en: What do you think this salvation is? It is My assurance of your freedom from smallpox.
ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   hoso sen yoni tashika ukeyau
jp_1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: ほふそせんよにたしかうけやう

en: Another salvation I desire to teach: an equally abundant harvest everywhere at all times.
ro: mata tasuke ryuke ichiretsu dokomade mo   itsumo hosaku oshietai kara
jp_1: またゝすけりうけ一れつどこまでも
jp_2: いつもほふさくをしゑたいから

en: To train you in such a path quickly is My desire, but there is no understanding in anyone's mind.
ro: kono michi o hayaku shikomo to omoedomo   ichiretsu kokoro wakari nai node
jp_1: このみちをはやくしこもとをもゑども
jp_2: 一れつ心わかりないので

en: I do not discriminate among any of you in the world. Please ponder, each of you.
ro: sekaiju doko ni hedate wa nai hodoni   ichiretsu shiyan shite kureru yo
jp_1: せかいぢうどこにへだてわないほどに
jp_2: 一れつしやんしてくれるよふ

en: If a true resolve comes to your mind, and you do not turn away from the words of God,
ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro ni sadame mina tsuite   Kami no yu koto somuki nakereba
jp_1: しんぢつに心にさだめみなついて
jp_2: 神のゆう事そむきなければ

en: Then Tsukihi will firmly accept this mind and directly hasten your salvation.
ro: soreyori mo Tsukihi no kokoro shikkari to   uketori shidai tasuke sekikomu
jp_1: それよりも月日の心しいかりと
jp_2: うけとりしだいたすけせきこむ

en: Do not think of this salvation as being trivial. It is the principal matter of the Divine Record of Nihon.
ro: kono tasuke chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   kore wa nihon no ichi no Koki ya
jp_1: このたすけ一寸の事やとをもうなよ
jp_2: これわにほんの一のこふきや

en: If only I show this quickly and clearly, however high your place may be...
ro: kore saika hayaku shikkari miseta nara   dono yona takai tokoro naru tomo
jp_1: これさいかはやくしいかりみせたなら
jp_2: とのよな高いところなるとも

en: This indeed is not human workings. No one will be able to turn away from the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi.
ro: kore bakari ningen waza de nai karani   Tsukihi juyo somuki dekemai
jp_1: こればかりにんけんハさでないからに
jp_2: 月日ぢうよふそむきでけまい

en: When it is shown, however high your place may be, you will not be able to imitate it. Ponder this.
ro: shitaru nara ika hodo takai tokoro demo   mane wa dekemai shiyan shite miyo
jp_1: したるならいかほと高いところても
jp_2: まねハてけまいしやんしてみよ

en: Though Tsukihi desires to show proof quickly against illness, death, and weakening,
ro: Tsukihi yori yamazu shinazu ni yowaran no   hayaku shoko daso to omoedo
jp_1: 月日よりやますしなすによわらんの
jp_2: はやくしよこふだそとをもへど

en: All of you everywhere doubt Me and take My words as being worldly common.
ro: ichiretsu wa mina utagote tare nitemo   sekainami ya to omote iru node
jp_1: 一れつハみなうたごふてたれにても
jp_2: せかいなみやとをもているので

en: There is not at all a human mind at this place. There are only the thoughts of Tsukihi.
ro: kono tokoro ningen gokoro sarani nashi   Tsukihi no omou koto bakari ya de
jp_1: このところにんけん心さらになし
jp_2: 月日のをもう事ばかりやで

en: But there is no one who knows this. That there is no understanding is the regret of God.
ro: sono koto o tare demo shiranu koto ya kara   wakari nai no ga Kami no zannen
jp_1: その事をたれてもしらぬ事やから
jp_2: わかりないのが神のさんねん

en: Is there not a way that the minds of all of you can be truly purified?
ro: kono kokoro dozo shinjitsu ichiretsu no   kokoro sumasuru moyo nai ka yo
jp_1: この心どふぞしんちつ一れつの
jp_2: 心すまするもよふないかよ

en: If only your minds quickly become open to reason, I shall show you the proof at once.
ro: kokoro sai hayaku wakarita koto naraba   sono mama suguni shoko dasu no ni
jp_1: 心さいはやくハかりた事ならば
jp_2: そのまゝすぐにしよこだすのに

en: Until now, I have listened to all kinds of falsehood, but from now on I shall hear them no more.
ro: imamade wa dono yona uso mo kiite ita   mo korekara wa uso wa kikan de
jp_1: いまゝでハとのよなうそもきいていた
jp_2: もふこれからハうそハきかんで

en: From now on, if you speak falsely, you yourself will become false. Beware!
ro: korekara wa uso o yu tara sono mono ga   uso ni naru nomo kore ga shochi ka
jp_1: これからハうそをゆうたらそのものが
jp_2: うそになるのもこれがしよちか

en: Tsukihi dislikes falsehood and flattery. If you persist, Tsukihi will withdraw.
ro: Tsukihi niwa uso to tsuisho kore kirai   konosaki naru wa Tsukihi shirizoku
jp_1: 月日にハうそとついしよこれきらい
jp_2: このさきなるわ月日しりぞく

en: Therefore, I have postponed yet another day, overlooking almost all of them.
ro: soreyue ni ichi nichi narito hi o nobashi   taitei nanimo miyurushite ita
jp_1: それゆへに一日なりとひをのばし
jp_2: たいていなにもみゆるしていた

en: I say that I desire to show the proof quickly at this time. What do you think of My words?
ro: konotabi no hayaku shoko dashitai to   yute iru no o nanto omou zo
jp_1: このたびのはやくしよこふだしたいと
jp_2: ゆうているのをなんとをもうぞ

en: What do you think the proof is to be? I have put a clear test on the body.
ro: shoko mo doyu koto ni omou kana   minouchi yori ni tashika tameshi o
jp_1: しよこふもとふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: みのうちよりにたしかためしを

en: About this test: know that the regret of Tsukihi is no small matter.
ro: kono tameshi makoto Tsukihi no zannen wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
jp_1: このためしまこと月日のさんねんわ
jp_2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ

en: A body that had no disorder anywhere: Tsukihi bent it and caused you much trouble.
ro: minouchi ni doko ni fusoku no nai mono ni   Tsukihi igamete kuro kaketa de
jp_1: みのうちにとこにふそくのないものに
jp_2: 月日いがめてくろふかけたで

en: The time was thirty-nine years ago. Since then, I have given you worries, troubles, and suffering.
ro: nengen wa sanju ku nen mo izen nite   shinpai kuro nayami kaketa de
jp_1: ねんけんハ三十九ねんもいせんにて
jp_2: しんばいくろふなやみかけたで

en: Because of it, you doubt all the words of Tsukihi. It is not unreasonable.
ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi yu koto nani goto mo   utagote iru kore muri de nai
jp_1: それゆへに月日ゆう事なに事も
jp_2: うたこふているこれむりでない

en: This time, I am preparing to clear up your innermost heart. This is the first matter.
ro: konotabi wa kono mune no uchi sukiyaka ni   harasu moyo ya kore ga daiichi
jp_1: このたびハ此むねのうちすきやかに
jp_2: はらすもよふやこれがだい一

en: Unless your mind is turned toward Tsukihi, any talk will be to no avail.
ro: kono kokoro Tsukihi no ho e shikkarito   tsuken koto niwa donna hanashi mo
jp_1: この心月日のほふゑしいかりと
jp_2: つけん事にハどんなはなしも

en: Everything that has been done is all by Tsukihi, but there is perhaps no one who knows this.
ro: ika naru no koto o shitaru mo mina Tsukihi   konna koto oba tare mo shiromai
jp_1: いかなるの事をしたるもみな月日
jp_2: こんな事をばたれもしろまい

en: Today, there will be no time even to look aside. I shall show you the proof quickly.
ro: kyonohi wa yokome furu ma mo nai hodoni   hayaku shoko dashite miseru de
jp_1: けふの日ハよこめふるまもないほどに
jp_2: はやくしよこふだしてみせるで

en: When you see it, be convinced, whoever you are. All of My talks proceed in this way.
ro: kore mitara donna mono demo tokushin se   nanino hanashi mo mina kono dori
jp_1: これみたらとんなものでもとくしんせ
jp_2: なにのはなしもみなこのどふり

en: My regret up till now is not something that can be told in words.
ro: imamade no kono zannen to yu mono wa   kuchi de yu yona koto de nai zo ya
jp_1: いまゝでのこのさんねんとゆうものわ
jp_2: くちでゆうよな事てないぞや

en: Until now, I have passed through a mountain of regrets. If I clear them away at this time,
ro: imamade wa yamayama zanen torinuke   konotabi kore o harashi taru nara
jp_1: いまゝでハ山／＼さねんとふりぬけ
jp_2: このたびこれをはらしたるなら

en: Thereafter, whatever illness or whatever else may be troubling you, you shall be saved from them all.
ro: ato naru wa donna yamai mo ika naru no   koto de aro ga mina tasukeru de
jp_1: あとなるハどんなやまいもいかなるの
jp_2: 事であろふがみなたすけるで

en: If I should make the origin of human beings known to the whole world,
ro: kono yo no ningen moto o sekaiju   shirashite oita koto de aru nara
jp_1: このよふのにんけんもとをせかいちう
jp_2: しらしてをいた事であるなら

en: Then I shall provide any salvation whatever. With but a word, I shall save you all.
ro: sorekara wa donna tasuke mo suru hodoni   hito koto made de mina tasukeru de
jp_1: それからハどんなたすけもするほとに
jp_2: 一事までゝみなたすけるで

en: Until now, though I have repeatedly taught the truth step by step, you do not understand the core.
ro: koremade wa dandan kudoki kotowari o   yute aredomo shin ga wakaran
jp_1: これまでハたん／＼くどきことハりを
jp_2: ゆうてあれどもしんかわからん

en: To explain what this core is: the pondering of your heart is the primary concern.
ro: kono shin wa doyu koto de aro nara   mune no shiyan o kore ga daiichi
jp_1: このしんハどふゆう事であろふなら
jp_2: むねのしやんをこれがたいゝち

en: If the heart and the mouth differ in any matter, never will it accord with the mind of God.
ro: nani nitemo mune to kuchi to ga chigote wa   Kami no kokoro ni kore wa kanawan
jp_1: なにゝてもむねとくちとがちこふてハ
jp_2: 神の心にこれハかなわん

en: If your sincerity does not accord with the mind of God, in vain is devotion, however great it may be.
ro: shinjitsu ga Kami no kokoro ni kanawaneba   ika hodo kokoro tsukushitaru tomo
jp_1: しんちつが神の心にかなハねば
jp_2: いかほど心つくしたるとも

en: On this one matter, whoever may come and however he may plead, it cannot be accepted. Tsukihi will withdraw.
ro: kore bakari ika hodo tare ga sodan mo   totemo kanawan Tsukihi shirizoku
jp_1: こればかりいかほどたれがそふたんも
jp_2: とてもかなハん月日しりぞく

en: In any matter, listen closely to the words of God. In whatever I say, there is never a mistake.
ro: nanimo kamo Kami no yu koto shikato kike   nani o yutemo chigau koto nashi
jp_1: なにもかも神のゆう事しかときけ
jp_2: なにをゆうてもちがう事なし

en: I truly desire to teach you marvelous salvation. That is why I tell you everything whatever.
ro: shinjitsu ni mezurashi tasuke oshietasa   sokode dono yona koto mo yu no ya
jp_1: しんちつにめつらしたすけをしへたさ
jp_2: そこでとのよな事もゆうのや

en: I desire to teach you everything that has been unknown since I began this world.
ro: kono yo o hajimete karani nai koto o   donna koto omo oshietai kara
jp_1: このよふを初てからにない事を
jp_2: どんな事をもをしへたいから

en: You must clearly understand the truth concerning the real origin of this world.
ro: kono yo no honmoto naru no shinjitsu o   shikkari shochi seneba ikan de
jp_1: このよふのほんもとなるのしんちつを
jp_2: しいかりしよちせねばいかんで

en: There is perhaps no one anywhere who knows this origin clearly.
ro: kono moto o shikkari shirite iru mono wa   doko no mono demo sarani arumai
jp_1: このもとをしいかりしりているものハ
jp_2: とこのものでもさらにあるまい

en: At this time, I shall tell you the real truth. Whatever I say, you must understand clearly.
ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu o yute kikasu   nani o yutemo shikato shochi se
jp_1: このたびハほんしんちつをゆてきかす
jp_2: なにをゆうてもしかとしよちせ

en: Among the instruments used in the beginning of human beings at this Residence, Izanagi and Izanami,
ro: kono yashiki ningen hajime dogu wa na   Izanagiii to Izanami to nari
jp_1: このやしきにんけんはじめどふぐハな
jp_2: いざなぎいゝといざなみとなり

en: Tsukiyomi, Kunisazuchi, Kumoyomi, and Kashikone are the primary instruments.
ro: Tsukiyomi to Kunisazuchii to Kumoyomi to   Kashikonee to ga ichi no dogu ya
jp_1: 月よみとくにさづちいとくもよみと
jp_2: かしこねへとが一のとふぐや

en: Then, the one called Otonobe is the primary instrument for the crops.
ro: soreyori mo Otonobee to yu no wa na   kore wa ryuke no ichi no dogu ya
jp_1: それよりもをふとのべへとゆうのハな
jp_2: これわりゆけの一のどふくや

en: Next, the one called Taishokuten is the scissors of the world.
ro: tsugi naru wa Taishokuten to yu no wa na   kore wa sekai no hasami naru zo ya
jp_1: つきなるハたいしよく天とゆうのハな
jp_2: これわせかいのはさみなるぞや

en: Until this time, calling together all the instruments, I have passed through every kind of path.
ro: koremade wa dogu issai mina yosete   dono yona michi mo torinuketa de
jp_1: これまでハどふぐいゝさいみなよせて
jp_2: とのよなみちもとふりぬけたで

en: Hereafter, I shall distinguish the instruments called together and hasten preparations to train them.
ro: konosaki wa yoseta dogu o miwake shite   shikomu moyo o isogu bakari ya
jp_1: このさきハよせたどふぐをみハけして
jp_2: しこむもよふをいそぐばかりや

en: Do not wonder where they can be found. Here are two, both eleven years old.
ro: kono mono wa doko ni aru ya to omouna yo   toshi wa ju ichi ni nin iru zo ya
jp_1: このものハとこにあるやとをもうなよ
jp_2: としわ十一二人いるぞや

en: One is an instrument used to begin human beings. The other is for the providence for all crops.
ro: kono nin wa ningen hajime kaketaru to   ryuke issai shugo dogu ya
jp_1: この人ハにんけんはじめかけたると
jp_2: りうけいゝさいしゆごふどふぐや

en: Today, I shall speak about any and all matters. Whatever I say, understand Me, please.
ro: kyonohi ni dono yona koto mo yu hodoni   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
jp_1: けふの日にどのよな事もゆうほどに
jp_2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ

en: Even until now, there were many intentions of God, but as the day had not come, I have held back.
ro: imamade mo Kami no omowaku mama aredo   hi ga kitaran de shikae itaru de
jp_1: いまゝでも神のをもハくまゝあれど
jp_2: ひがきたらんでしかゑいたるで

en: But as the day is pressing step by step, I shall give you all of My teachings.
ro: dandan to mo hi ga tsumari kiru kara wa   donna koto demo yute oku zo ya
jp_1: だん／＼ともふひがつまりきるからハ
jp_2: どんな事でもゆうてをくぞや

en: Until now, people everywhere have been alike. Whatever I said, all was doubted.
ro: koremade wa doko no hito demo onaji koto   nani o yutemo mina utagote
jp_1: これまでハどこの人でもをなじ事
jp_2: なにをゆうてもみなうたごふて

en: This time, it is the real truth. If you turn away from it, I shall give you a return at once.
ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu de aru karani   kore somuitara suguni kayasu de
jp_1: このたびハほんしんぢつであるからに
jp_2: これそむいたらすぐにかやすで

en: In the world, there are those who desire rain, but perhaps no one knows its origin.
ro: sekai niwa ame o hoshii to omota tote   kono moto naru o tare mo shiromai
jp_1: せかいにわあめをほしいとをもたとて
jp_2: このもとなるをたれもしろまい

en: I shall begin to tell you clearly about this origin. If only you would understand all that I say...
ro: kono moto o shikkari yute kakaru kara   donna koto demo shochi suru nara
jp_1: このもとをしいかりゆうてかゝるから
jp_2: どんな事でもしよちするなら

en: Today, a talk never given since this world began: please listen to whatever I say.
ro: kyonohi wa kono yo hajimete nai hanashi   nani o yutemo kore kiite kure
jp_1: けふの日ハこのよはじめてないはなし
jp_2: なにをゆうてもこれきいてくれ

en: Though you are saying that this world is the world of God, you do not know the core of all matters.
ro: kono yo wa Kami no sekai to yui nagara   donna koto demo shin wa shiran de
jp_1: このよふわ神のせかいとゆいながら
jp_2: どんな事でもしんわしらんで

en: I shall truly manifest this core. When you see it, be convinced, all of you.
ro: kono shin o makoto shinjitsu shite miseru   kore mita naraba mina tokushin se
jp_1: このしんをまことしんぢつしてみせる
jp_2: これみたならばみなとくしんせ

en: Whatever is done, it is all by Tsukihi. Whatever is said, also, is all by Tsukihi.
ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo mina Tsukihi   nani o yu no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
jp_1: どのよふな事をするのもみな月日
jp_2: なにをゆうのもみな月日やで

en: This time, I shall manifest all things which have never existed since the world began.
ro: konotabi wa kono yo hajimete nai koto o   donna koto demo mina arawasu de
jp_1: このたびハこのよはじめてない事を
jp_2: どんな事でもみなあらわすで

en: Tsukihi is dwelling within the body. There is no knowing what workings I shall do.
ro: Tsukihi niwa tainai yori mo komori ite   donna shigoto o suru ya shiren de
jp_1: 月日にわたいないよりもこもりいて
jp_2: どんなしごとをするやしれんで

en: Whatever you may dream, it is all by Tsukihi. The reality seen, also, is all by Tsukihi.
ro: dono yona yume o miru no mo mina Tsukihi   makoto miru no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
jp_1: どのよふなゆめをみるのもみな月日
jp_2: まことみるのもみな月日やで

en: Never yet have I spoken about the origin of water in this world.
ro: kono yo no mizu no moto naru koto oba na   mada koremade wa yuta koto nashi
jp_1: このよふの水のもとなる事をばな
jp_2: まだこれまでわゆうた事なし

en: This time, on the real truth of water, there is no knowing what kind of talk I shall give.
ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu no mizu no koto   donna hanashi o suru ya shiren de
jp_1: このたびハほんしんぢつの水の事
jp_2: どんなはなしをするやしれんで

en: I shall begin to tell you about this origin clearly, but I cannot tell it as long as you think in common worldly ways.
ro: kono moto o tashikani yute kakaru kara   sekainami naru koto de yuwaren
jp_1: この元をたしかにゆうてかゝるから
jp_2: せかいなみなる事でゆハれん

en: From today, I shall begin to tell you about all matters whatever. Listen carefully to whatever I say.
ro: kyokara wa dono yona koto mo yuikakeru   nani o yutemo shikato kiku nari
jp_1: けふからわどのよな事もゆいかける
jp_2: なにをゆうてもしかときくなり

en: Day by day and step by step, those on the high mountains will come to Me to request or inquire whatever things.
ro: nichinichi ni takayama nitewa dandan to   donna koto oba tanomi tazuneru
jp_1: にち／＼に高山にてわだん／＼と
jp_2: どんな事をばたのみたつねる

en: When this comes to be, there will be no danger in any matters whatever.
ro: kore saika mie kita naraba dono yona   koto mo abunaki sarani nai zo ya
jp_1: これさいかみゑきたならばどのよふな
jp_2: 事もあふなきさらにないぞや

en: Today, there is no knowing what talks I shall give. Please understand whatever I say.
ro: kyonohi wa nanino hanashi o suru yara na   donna koto demo shochi shite kure
jp_1: けふの日ハなにのはなしをするやらな
jp_2: どんな事でもしよちしてくれ

en: I shall make everything in the mind of each of you clearly manifest on your body.
ro: meme no kokoro minouchi dono yona   koto demo shikato mina arawasu de
jp_1: めへ／＼の心みのうちどのよふな
jp_2: 事でもしかとみなあらわすで

en: Whoever you may be, when this is seen, the cleansing of the heart will be truly accomplished of itself.
ro: kore mitara donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
jp_1: これみたらどんなものでもしんぢつに
jp_2: むねのそふちがひとりてけるで

en: This time, I shall bring all things clearly out into the open and demonstrate My working.
ro: konotabi wa donna koto demo sukiyaka ni   araware dashite mina shite miseru
jp_1: このたびハどんな事でもすきやかに
jp_2: あらわれだしてみなしてみせる

en: There is perhaps no one who knows what exists inside the body.
ro: tainai ni nani ga aru yara dono yona   mono demo shirita mono wa arumai
jp_1: たいないになにがあるやらどのよふな
jp_2: ものでもしりたものわあるまい

en: About this talk: look at the workings of Tsukihi! There is no knowing what I shall do in accordance with your mind.
ro: kono hanashi Tsukihi no shigoto kore o miyo   kokoro shidai ni nani o suru yara
jp_1: このはなし月日のし事これをみよ
jp_2: 心しだいになにをするやら

en: Today, being aware of nothing, all people remain in a common worldly state.
ro: kyonohi wa nanimo shirazu ni tare nitemo   sekainami naru koto de aredomo
jp_1: けふの日ハなにもしらすにたれにても
jp_2: せかいなみなる事であれども

en: But what path will be seen tomorrow? The core of your mind will become apparent.
ro: asunichi wa doyu michi o miru yara na   shin no kokoro ga arawarete kuru
jp_1: あすにちハどふゆうみちをみるやらな
jp_2: しんの心があらわれてくる

en: When this mind is fully apparent, no one will ever be able to turn away.
ro: kono kokoro araware detaru koto naraba   tare mo somuki wa sarani dekemai
jp_1: この心あらわれでたる事ならば
jp_2: たれもそむきわさらにてけまい

en: When this is seen, all of you, whoever you may be, will bow your head and truly ponder.
ro: kore mitara donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   atama katagete mina shiyan suru
jp_1: これみたらどんなものでもしんちつに
jp_2: あたまかたけてみなしやんする

en: Now ponder! If only the settling of this mind is definitely accomplished...
ro: sa shiyan kono kokoro sai shikkari to   sadame tsuitaru koto de aru nara
jp_1: さあしやんこの心さいしいかりと
jp_2: さだめついたる事であるなら

en: This talk is solely from the mind of Tsukihi. Do not think I have a human mind.
ro: kono hanashi Tsukihi no kokoro bakari ya de   ningen gokoro aru to omouna
jp_1: このはなし月日の心ばかりやで
jp_2: にんけん心あるとをもうな

en: If all of you in the world pray with this thought sincerely held, you shall receive any blessing, whatever it may be.
ro: kono koto o mina ichiretsu wa shinjitsu ni   omote tanomeba donna koto demo
jp_1: この事をみな一れつハしんちつに
jp_2: をもてたのめばどんな事でも

en: Until today, you have worried about many things. But from tomorrow, a broad path will open.
ro: kyomade wa nanika shinpai shita naredo   asunichi kara wa okwan no michi
jp_1: 一けふまでわなにかしんばいしたなれど
jp_2: あすにちからわをふくハんのみち

en: Until now, because I foresaw all the paths of hardship, My words were filled with warnings.
ro: imamade wa donna nanju na michisuji mo   miete aru kara kotowari bakari
jp_1: いまゝでハどんななんぢうなみちすちも
jp_2: みへてあるからことわりばかり

en: Hereafter, as it is Tsukihi who firmly assures you, there will be no danger in anything at all.
ro: konosaki wa tashika ukeyau Tsukihi niwa   donna koto demo abunaki wa nai
jp_1: このさきハたしかうけやう月日にハ
jp_2: どんな事でもあふなきハない

en: Whatever tidings you may hear step by step, rejoice all the world. They are the workings of Tsukihi.
ro: dandan to donna hanashi o kiita tote   sekai tanoshime Tsukihi hataraki
jp_1: たん／＼とどんなはなしをきいたとて
jp_2: せかいたのしめ月日はたらき

en: The work that Tsukihi will go forth to do from now on: perhaps no one knows what it will be.
ro: korekara wa Tsukihi dekakeru hataraki ni   nani o suru tomo tare mo shiromai
jp_1: これからわ月日でかけるはたらきに
jp_2: なにをするともたれもしろまい

en: Day after day, looking throughout the world, I feel pity for all My children.
ro: nichinichi ni sekai no tokoro misumaseba   ichiretsu kodomo ijirashii koto
jp_1: にち／＼にせかいのところみすませば
jp_2: 一れつこどもいぢらしい事

en: All the efforts of Tsukihi made step by step are solely to hasten preparations for your salvation.
ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan donna koto demo na   tasukeru moyo seku bakari ya de
jp_1: 月日にわたん／＼どんな事でもな
jp_2: たすけるもよふせくはかりやで

en: Until now, I have given you nothing but warnings. From now on, there will be warnings no longer.
ro: koremade wa kotowari bakari yute oita   mo korekara wa kotowari wa nai
jp_1: これまでハことわりはかりゆてをいた
jp_2: もふこれからハことハりわない

en: Until today, being aware of nothing, you have used only the human mind and worried yourselves.
ro: kyomade wa nanimo shirazu ni ningen no   kokoro bakari de shinpai o shita
jp_1: けふまでわなにもしらすににんけんの
jp_2: 心ばかりでしんはいをした

en: From now, firmly replace that mind, lean on God, and do the Joyous Service.
ro: korekara wa kokoro shikkari irekaete   Kami ni motarete Yoki-zutome o
jp_1: これからハ心しいかりいれかへて
jp_2: 神にもたれてよふきつとめを

en: When it is done, I shall directly reveal blessings clearly. Watch for them.
ro: shitaru nara sono mama suguni shikkari to   riyaku arawasu kore o mite kure
jp_1: したるならそのまゝすくにしいかりと
jp_2: りやくあらわすこれをみてくれ

en: If only the blessings are clearly seen, thereafter all will be the Kanrodai for all time.
ro: kore saika tashika riyaku ga mieta nara   ato wa itsu demo mina Kanrodai
jp_1: これさいかたしかりやくがみへたなら
jp_2: あとわいつてもみなかんろふだい

en: Hereafter, you shall not be able to turn away from whatever words Tsukihi once says.
ro: konosaki wa Tsukihi ichido yuta koto   donna koto demo somuki dekemai
jp_1: このさきわ月日一どふゆうた事
jp_2: どんな事でもそむきでけまい

en: If you erase the words of Tsukihi, I shall withdraw at once. Beware!
ro: Tsukihi yori yutaru koto o kesu naraba   suguni shirizoku shochi shite iyo
jp_1: 月日よりゆうたる事をけすならば
jp_2: すぐにしりぞくしよちしていよ

en: Until now, in the minds of those within and those of the world, there has been no true understanding.
ro: imamade wa uchi mo sekai mo shinjitsu no   kokoro ni wakari sarani nai node
jp_1: いまゝでハうちもせかいもしんちつの
jp_2: 心にわかりさらにないので

en: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. If I could somehow make your minds clear...
ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nanto kore oba sumashitaru nara
jp_1: 月日にハ大一これがざんねんな
jp_2: なんとこれをばすましたるなら

en: How can I bring understanding to your minds? In any case I must admonish you.
ro: kono kokoro doshita naraba wakaru yara   nandemo iken seneba naran de
jp_1: この心どふしたならばわかるやら
jp_2: なんてもいけんせねならんで

en: This admonition is not just for a few. As it concerns the hearts of so many, it is indeed difficult.
ro: iken demo chotto no hito dewa nai karani   oku no mune ga kore wa mutsukashi
jp_1: いけんでも一寸の人でわないからに
jp_2: をふくのむねがこれわむつかし

en: However difficult it may be, I shall admonish My children, one and all.
ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   meme no kodomo iken suru zo ya
jp_1: いかほどにむつかし事とゆうたとて
jp_2: めへ／＼のこどもいけんするぞや

en: What is the best way to accomplish it? By all means, I shall manifest the regret of God.
ro: kono moyo doshita naraba yokaro zo   nandemo Kami no zanen arawasu
jp_1: このもよふどふしたならばよかろふぞ
jp_2: なんでも神のさねんあらわす

en: Day by day and step by step, the dust piles up and fills the heart of God.
ro: nichinichi ni Kami no mune niwa dandan to   hokori ippai tsumori aredomo
jp_1: にち／＼に神のむねにハたん／＼と
jp_2: ほこりいゝばいつもりあれども

en: This dust is difficult to sweep away. But if you only begin the Service...
ro: kono hokori soji suru no wa mutsukashii   Tsutome nari tomo kakaritaru nara
jp_1: このほこりそふぢするのハむつかしい
jp_2: つとめなりともかゝりたるなら

en: If only your minds are truly accepted by God, I shall sweep away any dust whatever.
ro: kokoro sai shinjitsu Kami ga uketoreba   donna hokori mo soji suru nari
jp_1: 心さいしんぢつ神がうけとれば
jp_2: どんなほこりもそふぢするなり

en: If only the innermost hearts of all humankind are swept clean,
ro: ichiretsu no mune no uchi sai sukiyaka ni   soji shitateta koto de aru nara
jp_1: いちれつのむねのうちさいすきやかに
jp_2: そふちしたてた事であるなら

en: Then, the whole world will be spirited and joyousness will come of its own accord.
ro: sorekara wa sekaiju wa ki ga isamu   yokizukume ni hitori naru zo ya
jp_1: それからわせかいぢううハきがいさむ
jp_2: よふきづくめにひとりなるぞや

en: Listen! From the high mountains to the low valleys, I see no one but Tsukihi's children.
ro: shikato kike takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   mireba Tsukihi no kodomo bakari ya
jp_1: しかときけ高山にてもたにそこも
jp_2: みれば月日のこどもばかりや

en: You human beings must all love your children. From this, please think of the regret of God.
ro: ningen mo ichiretsu kodomo kawaikaro   Kami no zannen kore omote kure
jp_1: にんけんも一れつこともかハいかろ
jp_2: 神のさんねんこれをもてくれ

en: Hitherto, no matter what had been seen, God only looked on, keeping still.
ro: koremade wa dono yona koto o mita totemo   Kami no ho niwa jitto mite ita
jp_1: これまてハどのよな事をみたとても
jp_2: 神のほふにハぢいとみていた

en: This time, as the day is pressing, I shall speak out on everything, whatever it may be.

jp_1: このたびわもふひがつんであるからな
jp_2: どんな事でもみなゆうほどに

en: Though Tsukihi looks all over the world, there is no one who knows the origin.
ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju o miwatasedo   moto hajimari o shirita mono nashi
jp_1: 月日にわせかいぢううをみハたせど
jp_2: もとはじまりをしりたものなし

en: Desiring to teach this origin to the world by all means, Tsukihi has become revealed.
ro: kono moto o dozo sekai e oshietasa   sokode Tsukihi ga arawarete deta
jp_1: このもとをどふぞせかいへをしへたさ
jp_2: そこで月日があらわれてゞた

en: About the regret of Tsukihi at this time: know that it is not a small matter.
ro: konotabi no Tsukihi zanen to yu mono wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
jp_1: このたびの月日ざねんとゆうものわ
jp_2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ

en: Tsukihi desires to teach this truth throughout the world by all means.
ro: Tsukihi niwa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   doshite nari to oshietai kara
jp_1: 月日にハこのしんぢつをせかへぢうゑ
jp_2: どふしてなりとをしへたいから

en: Unaware of it, you erase all the words of Tsukihi, and all that remains is rampant human thinking.

jp_1: それしらず月日ゆう事みなけして
jp_2: あとわにんけん心はびかる

en: Hereafter, I shall clear away all the regret and anger of Tsukihi. Are you aware of it?
ro: konosaki wa Tsukihi no zanen rippuku o   mina harasu de na kore ga shochi ka
jp_1: このさきハ月日のざねんりいふくを
jp_2: みなはらすでなこれがしよちか

en: After the regret and anger of Tsukihi are cleared away, I shall open a marvelous path.

jp_1: 月日にもざねんりいふくはらしたら
jp_2: あとハめづらしみちをつけるで

en: What do you think this path is to be? It is solely mutual help among all people in all matters.

jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: よろづたがいにたすけばかりを

en: If all the world comes to help one another, Tsukihi will accept all your minds.

jp_1: せかいぢうたがいにたすけするならば
jp_2: 月日も心みなひきうける

en: If Tsukihi accepts your minds, I shall work in all matters whatever.
ro: Tsukihi nimo kokoro hikiuke suru kara wa   donna koto demo hataraki o suru
jp_1: 月日にも心ひきうけするからわ
jp_2: どんな事でもはたらきをする

en: What do you think this working is to be? It is solely to distinguish between good and evil.
ro: hataraki mo doyu koto ni omou kana   zen to aku to o wakeru bakari ya
jp_1: はたらきもどふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: 善とあくとをわけるばかりや

en: Until today, whatever wrongdoing there is said to be, perhaps none of you has known of it on your body.
ro: kyomade wa donna akuji to yuta tote   waga mi ni shirita mono wa arumai
jp_1: けふまでわどんなあくじとゆうたとて
jp_2: わがみにしりたものハあるまい

en: God will teach you the truth about this. Ponder over it, all of you.
ro: kono kokoro Kami ga shinjitsu yute kikasu   mina ichiretsu wa shiyan shite kure
jp_1: この心神がしんぢつゆてきかす
jp_2: みないちれつわしやんしてくれ

en: All of you throughout the world are brothers and sisters. There should be no one called an outsider.
ro: sekaiju ichiretsu wa mina kyodai ya   tanin to yu wa sarani nai zo ya
jp_1: せかいぢういちれつわみなきよたいや
jp_2: たにんとゆうわさらにないぞや

en: That there is no one who knows the origin of this is the very cause of the regret of Tsukihi.
ro: kono moto o shiritaru mono wa nai node na   sore ga Tsukihi no zanen bakari ya
jp_1: このもとをしりたるものハないのでな
jp_2: それが月日のざねんばかりや

en: Those living in the high mountains and those living in the low valleys: their souls are all the same.
ro: takayama ni kurashite irumo tanisoko ni   kurashite irumo onashi tamahii
jp_1: 高山にくらしているもたにそこに
jp_2: くらしているもをなしたまひい

en: Furthermore, the instruments you use daily are all things lent by Tsukihi.
ro: soreyori mo dandan tsukau dogu wa na   mina Tsukihi yori kashimono naru zo
jp_1: それよりもたん／＼つかうどふぐわな
jp_2: みな月日よりかしものなるぞ

en: Unaware of this, the thought in the minds of all human beings is that there are the high and the low.
ro: sore shirazu mina ningen no kokoro dewa   nando takabiku aru to omote
jp_1: それしらすみなにんけんの心でわ
jp_2: なんどたかびくあるとをもふて

en: By all means, Tsukihi desires to make the truth of this matter clearly understood by the whole world.
ro: Tsukihi niwa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   dozo shikkari shochi sashitai
jp_1: 月日にハこのしんぢつをせかいぢうへ
jp_2: どふぞしいかりしよちさしたい

en: If only this is clearly understood, the root of rebellion will be cut off.
ro: kore saika tashikani shochi shita naraba   muhon no ne wa kirete shimau ni
jp_1: これさいかたしかにしよちしたならば
jp_2: むほんのねへわきれてしまうに

en: Tsukihi sincerely desires only to end the wars among those on the high mountains.
ro: Tsukihi yori shinjitsu omou takayama no   tatakai saika osametaru nara
jp_1: 月日よりしんぢつをもう高山の
jp_2: たゝかいさいかをさめたるなら

en: By what means can they be ended? If only you set forth on the Joyous Service...
ro: kono moyo doshita naraba osamaro   Yoki-zutome ni detaru koto nara
jp_1: このもよふどふしたならばをさまろふ
jp_2: よふきづとめにでたる事なら

en: Do not wonder from whose mind these words come. They are solely from the mind of Tsukihi.
ro: kono kokoro tare ga yu towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
jp_1: この心たれがゆうとハをもうなよ
jp_2: 月日の心ばかりなるぞや

en: It is difficult to do this Service because of the high mountains, but God gives you firm assurance.
ro: kono Tsutome takayama nitewa mutsukashii   Kami ga shikkari hikiuke o suru
jp_1: このつとめ高山にてハむつかしい
jp_2: 神がしいかりひきうけをする

en: This time, in all matters, I shall truly give you My firm assurance and shall work.
ro: konotabi wa donna koto demo shinjitsu ni   tashika ukeyai hataraki o suru
jp_1: このたびわどんな事でもしんちつに
jp_2: たしかうけやいはたらきをする

en: When God goes forth and works throughout the world, there will be nothing to fear in doing any Service.
ro: Kami ga dete sekaiju o hatarakeba   donna Tsutome mo kowami nai zo ya
jp_1: 神がでゝせかいぢううをはたらけば
jp_2: どんなつとめもこハみないぞや

en: Listen! Though the high mountains, boastful, have done as they pleased to the low valleys,
ro: shikato kike takayama ya tote tanisoko o   mamani shirareta koto de aredomo
jp_1: しかときけ高山やとてたにそこを
jp_2: まゝにしられた事であれども

en: From now on, Tsukihi shall come out in their place. Let them try to do as they please if they dare.
ro: korekara wa Tsukihi kawari ni deru hodoni   mamani shiyo nara sureba shite miyo
jp_1: これからわ月日かハりにでるほどに
jp_2: まゝにしよならすればしてみよ

en: Everything will be different from what it has been until now. From now on, it will be as God intends.
ro: imamade to nanika monku ga chigau de na   korekara saki wa Kami no mama ya de
jp_1: いまゝでとなにかもんくがちがうてな
jp_2: これからさきハ神のまゝやで

en: Perhaps no one knows the intention of Tsukihi in descending from Heaven.
ro: Tsukihi yori amakudari taru kokoro na   nanno koto yara tare mo shiromai
jp_1: 月日よりあまくだりたる心な
jp_2: なんの事やらたれもしろまい

en: First, to help those who grow crops, I desired to teach you on the matter of the fertilizer.
ro: daiichi wa ryuke tsukuru o tasuketasa   koe ichijo o oshietai kara
jp_1: 大一わりゆうけつくるをたすけたさ
jp_2: こゑ一ぢよふをしへたいから

en: Do not wonder why the fertilizer is effective. If only God accepts your mind...
ro: koe demo na doshite kiku to omouna yo   kokoro o Kami ga uketorita nara
jp_1: こゑてもなどふしてきくとをもうなよ
jp_2: こゝろを神がうけとりたなら

en: Though God has been speaking the truth until now, even those within only have doubts.
ro: imamade wa shinjitsu Kami ga yute aredo   uchi kara shitemo utagau bakari
jp_1: いまゝてハしんぢつ神がゆてあれど
jp_2: うちからしてもうたがうはかり

en: This time, do not doubt whatever I say. If you doubt, Tsukihi will withdraw.
ro: konotabi wa nani o yutemo utagau na   kore utagaeba Tsukihi shirizoku
jp_1: 此のたびハなにをゆうてもうたがうな
jp_2: これうたがへば月日しりぞく

en: I repeat this to you tediously. If you doubt, you will truly repent it.
ro: kono koto wa akudoi hodomo yute oku   kore utagaeba makoto kokwai
jp_1: この事ハあくどいほともゆうてをく
jp_2: これうたがへばまことこふくハい

en: What Tsukihi has once said will never become false through all time.
ro: Tsukihi yori ichido yute oita koto   itsu ni naritemo chigau koto nashi
jp_1: 月日より一どふゆうてをいた事
jp_2: いつになりてもちがう事なし

en: Until now, all of you have only doubted whatever Tsukihi said, always erasing it by your words.
ro: imamade wa Tsukihi nani goto yuta tote   mina utagote yuikesu bakari
jp_1: いまゝでわ月日なに事ゆうたとて
jp_2: みなうたごふてゆいけすばかり

en: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. I shall correct this matter by all means.
ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nandemo kore o shikato kimeru de
jp_1: 月日にハ大一これがざんねんな
jp_2: なんでもこれをしかときめるで

en: From now on, you must not turn away from whatever Tsukihi says. You must lean on God.

jp_1: これからハ月日ゆう事なに事も
jp_2: そむかんよふに神にもたれよ

en: Then I, God, shall truly give you My firm assurance and shall work.
ro: shitaru nara Kami no ho nimo shinjitsu ni   tashika hikiuke hataraki o suru
jp_1: したるなら神のほふにもしんちつに
jp_2: たしかひきうけはたらきをする

en: As Tsukihi persuades you to such a degree, if your mind is in error, I shall withdraw at once.

jp_1: 月日にハこらほどくどきつめるから
jp_2: 心ちがゑばすぐにしりぞく

en: If your mind is truly sincere, there will never be a failure in any salvation.
ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro ni makoto aru naraba   donna tasuke mo chigau koto nashi
jp_1: しんちつに心にまことあるならば
jp_2: どんなたすけもちがう事なし

en: Hereafter, in order that there be no failure in the fertilizer for the crops, please understand Me clearly.
ro: konosaki wa ryuke no koe o chigawan yo   dozo shikkari shochi shite kure
jp_1: このさきハりゆけのこへをちがハんよ
jp_2: どふぞしいかりしよちしてくれ

en: From today, I shall begin to tell you the thoughts of Tsukihi on all matters whatever.
ro: kyokara wa Tsukihi no omou koto oba na   dono yona koto mo mina yuikakeru
jp_1: けふからわ月日のをもう事をばな
jp_2: どのよな事もみなゆいかける

en: Though even until now I have told you almost everything, I have not yet told you Tsukihi's intention.
ro: imamade mo taite hanashi mo toitaredo   Tsukihi omowaku mada yute nai
jp_1: いまゝでもたいてはなしもといたれど
jp_2: 月日をもハくまだゆうてない

en: From now on, whatever talks I may give, never think that they are false.
ro: korekara wa donna hanashi o shitaru tomo   kore o kanarazu uso to omouna
jp_1: これからハどんなはなしをしたるとも
jp_2: これをかならすうそをもうな

en: There is no knowing what I shall say, for the mind of Tsukihi hastens.
ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   Tsukihi no kokoro sete iru kara
jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうやらしれんてな
jp_2: 月日の心せゑているから

en: What do you think My thoughts are about? They are about Nihon, Kara, and Tenjiku.

jp_1: この心どふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: にほんもからもてんちくまでも

en: Though there are many leagues in between, I shall work even in a single night.

jp_1: このあいだみちのりよほどあるけれど
jp_2: いちやのまにもはたらきをする

en: What are you humans thinking of this talk? Your bodies are things lent by Tsukihi and you are all children of Mine.

jp_1: このはなしにんけんなんとをもている
jp_2: 月日かしものみなわがこども

en: So long as Tsukihi keeps still, there will be no hope of a settling.
ro: itsumade mo Tsukihi jikkuri shite ireba   itsu ni naritemo osamaru me nashi
jp_1: いつまでも月日ぢいくりしていれば
jp_2: いつになりてもをさまるめなし

en: Therefore, Tsukihi will go forth to work. There is no one who knows where I shall go.
ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi dekakeru hataraki ni   doko e deru yara shirita mono nashi

jp_2: とこへでるやらしりたものなし

en: I say that I shall purify all minds throughout the world. Never think of it as a small matter.

jp_1: せかいぢう心すますとゆうからわ
jp_2: 一寸の事やとさらにをもうな

en: In whatever matters, if the innermost heart of each of you is purified, there will be no danger.

jp_2: すましたならばあふなきわない

jp_2: をふくの人をまつばかりやで

en: The reason I am waiting for these people is that I desire to save all of My children in the world.

jp_1: この人をどふゆう事でまつならば
jp_2: 一れつわがこたすけたいから

en: You cannot know what a marvelous path will come into sight this year.
ro: kotoshi niwa donna mezurashi michisuji ga   miete kuru yara kore shiren de na
jp_1: ことしにハどんなめづらしみちすじが
jp_2: みゑてくるやらこれしれんてな

en: No matter how I try to tell you the truth by words, there is no one who understands.
ro: kuchi saki de nanbo shinjitsu yuta tote   tare ka kikiwake suru mono wa nai
jp_1: 口さきでなんほしんちつゆうたとて
jp_2: たれかきゝわけするものハない

en: Therefore, Tsukihi will at this time demonstrate the truth for you in all matters.
ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi konotabi dono yona   koto mo shinjitsu mina shite miseru
jp_1: それゆへに月日このたびどのよふな
jp_2: 事もしんちつみなしてみせる

en: Whatever I do, never think that there is any human mind mixed in it.
ro: dono yona koto o shitaru mo ningen no   kokoro majiru to sarani omouna
jp_1: どのよふな事をしたるもにんけんの
jp_2: 心まぢるとさらにをもうな

en: Tsukihi cannot bear to look on any longer. That is why I shall work in all matters.
ro: Tsukihi niwa amari shinjitsu mikaneru de   sokode dono yona koto mo suru no ya
jp_1: 月日にハあまりしんぢつみかねるで
jp_2: そこでとのよな事もするのや

en: However strong or youthful you may be, never think that such a condition is reliable.
ro: ika hodono goteki tarumo wakaki demo   kore o tayori to sarani omouna
jp_1: いかほどのごうてきたるもハかきても
jp_2: これをたよりとさらにをもうな

en: At this time, God is openly revealed and speaks to you freely without restriction.
ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i arawarete   juyojizai ni hanashi suru kara
jp_1: このたびハ神がをもていあらハれて
jp_2: ぢうよぢざいにはなしするから

en: As I shall work in truth in all matters, your innermost heart will, of itself, be made clear.
ro: donoyo na koto mo shinjitsu suru kara wa   mune no uchi yori hitori sumikiru
jp_1: どのよふな事もしんぢつするからハ
jp_2: むねのうちよりひとりすみきる

en: Until now, all humankind has been pondering only with the human mind.
ro: imamade wa ichiretsu wa mina ningen no   kokoro bakari de shiyan shitaredo
jp_1: いまゝでわ一れつハみなにんけんの
jp_2: 心ばかりてしやんしたれど

en: This time, there is no need at all to ponder with the human mind on any matter.
ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo ningen no   kokoro shiyan wa sarani iran de
jp_1: このたびわどのよな事もにんけんの
jp_2: 心しやんわさらにいらんで

en: I shall tell you any and everything. Whatever I say, never take it to be false.
ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo yute oku   nani o yutemo uso to omouna
jp_1: なにもかもとのよな事もゆうてをく
jp_2: なにをゆうてもうそとをもうな

en: Whatever kind of people may be rampant on the high mountains, no one knows the truth.
ro: takayama de dono yona mono ga habikaru mo   kono shinjitsu o tare mo shiromai
jp_1: 高山でとのよなものがはびかるも
jp_2: このしんちつをたれもしろまい

en: Wherever you may be, Tsukihi clearly sees your innermost heart.
ro: Tsukihi niwa donna tokoro ni iru mono mo   mune no uchi oba shikato mite iru
jp_1: 月日にわどんなところにいるものも
jp_2: むねのうちをばしかとみている

en: If your innermost heart accords with the mind of Tsukihi, I shall exert Myself in your favor forever.
ro: mune no uchi Tsukihi kokoro ni kanotara   itsu made nari to shikato funbaru
jp_1: むねのうち月日心にかのふたら
jp_2: いつまでなりとしかとふんばる

en: The mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day. Yet there is no understanding in the minds of you close to Me.

jp_1: 月日よりにち／＼心せきこめど
jp_2: そばの心にわかりないので

en: What do you think My hastening is about? If you grow crops, you may be in need of water.

jp_1: せきこみもなにの事やとをもうかな
jp_2: りゆけつくれば水がほしかろ

en: In the minds of all of you, with what thoughts are you pondering over this talk?
ro: kono hanashi mina ichiretsu no kokoro niwa   nanto omote shiyan shite iru
jp_1: このはなしみな一れつの心にわ
jp_2: なんとをもふてしやんしている

en: Tsukihi desires first to help you in your needs. That is why I speak of all things whatever.
ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore o tasuketasa   sokode dono yona koto mo yu no ya
jp_1: 月日にわ大一これをたすけたさ
jp_2: そこでどのよな事もゆうのや

en: No matter how Tsukihi tries to persuade you of all matters, no one listens to My words as the truth.
ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi ika hodo kudoitemo   makoto ni kiite kureru mono nashi
jp_1: なにもかも月日いかほどくどいても
jp_2: まことにきいてくれるものなし

en: Therefore, the regret and anger of Tsukihi have piled up like a mountain.
ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi no zanen rippuku ga   yamayama tsumori kasanarite aru
jp_1: それゆへに月日のざねんりいふくが
jp_2: 山／＼つもりかさなりてある

en: Until now, as the month and day has not yet come, I have been keeping still.
ro: imamade wa Tsukihi kitaran soreyue ni   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
jp_1: いまゝでわ月日きたらんそれゆへに
jp_2: ぢいとしていた事であれども

en: This time, as the time is pressing, I shall quickly begin any work whatever.
ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsunde aru kara na   donna shigoto mo hayaku kakaru de
jp_1: このたびわもふひがつんであるからな
jp_2: とんなしごともはやくかゝるで

en: Hereafter, on whatever path you may find yourself, never bear a grudge against others. Reproach yourself.
ro: konosaki wa dono yona michi ga aru totemo   hito o uramina waga mi urami ya
jp_1: このさきわどのよなみちがあるとても
jp_2: 人をうらみなハがみうらみや

en: This talk is not for a particular place. It is for the high mountains as well as for the low valleys.
ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   takayama nitemo tanisoko made mo
jp_1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんでな
jp_2: 高山にてもたにそこまても

en: Everything I say is from My desire to save you. That is the reason for My various and repeated persuasions.

jp_2: 事でもあしき事わゆハんで

jp_2: そこでたん／＼いけんしたのや

jp_2: たすけるもよふはやくをしへる

jp_2: ほふそせんよのまむりつとめを

jp_1: またたすけやますしなずによハらんの
jp_2: しよこまむりをはやくやりたい

jp_1: なにもかもよろづたすけをせくからに
jp_2: 心したいにどんな事ても

en: All humankind, everything depends on the heart of each of you. There is nothing that cannot be realized.

jp_1: 一れつわみなめへ／＼のむねしだい
jp_2: どんな事をがかなハんてなし

en: About the prayer for rain, though God has not said anything yet in truth,

jp_2: なにもゆうたる事わなけれど

jp_1: このたびハとのよな事もしんぢつを
jp_2: たづねくるならみなゆてきかす

jp_1: 月日にハなにかなハんとゆハんてな
jp_2: みなめへ／＼の心したいや

en: Whatever you may dream, it is by Tsukihi. Whatever is said, also, is all by Tsukihi.

jp_2: なにをゆうのもみな月日やで

jp_2: そばの心わいづむばかりで

jp_2: 上にハなにもしらんゆへなり

en: Unaware of this, the whole world follows them in all matters and is depressed.

jp_2: みなしたこふていつみいるなり

jp_1: 月日にわ大一これがさんねんな
jp_2: そこでどのよな事もするのや

jp_1: 月日よりにち／＼心せゑたとで
jp_2: くちでわとふむゆうにゆハれん

jp_1: それゆへにゆめでなりともにをいがけ
jp_2: はやくしやんをしてくれるよふ

en: This regret of Tsukihi is not something that can be told in words.
ro: Tsukihi niwa kono zannen to yu mono wa   kuchi de yu yona koto de nai zo ya
jp_1: 月日にハこのざんねんとゆうものわ
jp_2: くちてゆうよな事でないぞや

jp_1: けふまでわどんなはなしもたん／＼と
jp_2: いろ／＼といてきたるなれども

en: But as the day of the appointed time has not yet come, you have seen nothing.

jp_1: なにゆうもひがらこくけんきたらんで
jp_2: なにもみゑたる事わないので

en: That is why all of you doubt and erase by your words whatever Tsukihi says.
ro: soreyue ni nani o Tsukihi ga yuta tote   mina utagote yuikesu bakari
jp_1: それゆへになにを月日がゆうたとて
jp_2: みなうたごふてゆいけすばかり

en: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. By all means, I shall clearly reveal what I have said.

jp_1: 月日にハ大一これがさんねんな
jp_2: なんでもこれをしかとあらわす

jp_1: いまゝでハどんな事をばゆうたとて
jp_2: すぐにみゑたる事わなけれど

jp_1: このたびわ三かのうちにたん／＼と
jp_2: せかいのはなしなにをきくやら

jp_2: とんなしごとをするやしれんで

jp_1: このよふにかまいつきものばけものも
jp_2: かならすあるとさらにをもうな

jp_1: いまゝでに月日ざんねん山／＼と
jp_2: つもりてあるをみなはらすでな

jp_1: このはらしどふしてはらす事ならば
jp_2: 月日の心みなしてみせる

en: Many days have passed since I began this world. Yet perhaps you do not know the truth of Tsukihi.
ro: kyomade wa kono yo hajimete hi wa tatedo   Tsukihi shinjitsu mada shiromai na
jp_1: けふまでハこのよはじめてひわたてど
jp_2: 月日しんちつまだしろまいな

jp_1: とのよふな事でも月日する事や
jp_2: いかな事でもやまいでわない

jp_1: みのうちにとのよな事をしたとても
jp_2: やまいでわない月日ていりや

en: The world is saying that it is cholera, but it is Tsukihi informing you of the regret.

jp_2: 月日さんねんしらす事なり

jp_2: いつむばかりの心なれとも

jp_2: よふきづくめの心なるよふ

jp_1: 月日にわにんけんはじめかけたのわ
jp_2: よふきゆさんがみたいゆへから

jp_2: みなどこまでもいつむはかりで

jp_1: 月日よりよふきづくめとゆうのをな

jp_2: まゝにしていた事であれとも

jp_2: これそむいたらすぐにかやすで

jp_1: けふまてもをやのさねんとゆうものわ
jp_2: 一寸の事でわないとをもゑよ

jp_2: はびかるばかりなにもしらすに

jp_2: なんとあしきのよふにをもふて

jp_2: ゆふとをもゑばすぐにしりぞく

jp_2: せへいゝはいにことわりてをく

jp_2: しんばいしたる事であれども

jp_2: どんなさしすもうけたなれとも

en: Hereafter, it is the Parent who will direct. Nothing said against Me shall I ever accept.

jp_2: をやのさしすやさらにうけんで

jp_2: とんな事てもちいとしていた

jp_2: とんな事でもそのまゝにする

jp_2: どんな事をがあるやしれんで

en: Whatever may happen, there will be nothing to fear, depending on your mind of sincerity.

jp_2: どんな事てもたのしみばかり

en: Everyone throughout the world is a child dear to the Parent. There is no knowing what I may say out of My deep love for you.

jp_2: をやの心をしらしたいから

jp_2: いつまでいてもよふきつくめや

jp_2: とふりぬけてわきたるなれども

jp_2: このみちとふりぬけた事なら

jp_2: とんなものでもあふなきわない

jp_2: とんな事てもかやしゝてやる

jp_2: こまかしくゆへもふせへつうや

jp_2: なにかいさいをみなゆてきかせ

en: Perhaps you do not know what this talk is about. Tell them all about the workings of the Parent.

jp_1: このはなしなにの事やらしろまいな
jp_2: をやのはたらきみなゆうてをけ

en: Perhaps you do not know what My workings are. I shall make all minds in the world be revealed.

jp_2: せかいの心みなあらわすで

jp_2: めゑめゑのくちでみなゆいかける

en: Whatever kind of thing it may be, when you speak it by your own mouth, it may be impossible to deny.

jp_2: めづらしたすけをもているから

en: What do you think this salvation is? It is to be free from illness, death, and weakening.
ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   yamazu shinazu ni yowari naki yoni
jp_1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: やますしなすによハりなきよに

en: Such a thing has been unknown anywhere until now. I desire to show you the proof of it.
ro: konna koto imamade doko ni nai koto ya   kono shoko o shirashitasa ya de
jp_1: こんな事いまゝでどこにない事や
jp_2: このよしよこふをしらしたさやで

en: It is a thing not to be found anywhere until now. At this time, God desires to begin it.
ro: koremade wa doko tazunetemo nai koto ya   konotabi Kami ga hajimetasa ya de
jp_1: これまてハどこたつねてもない事や
jp_2: このたび神がはじめたさやで

en: Until today, you did not know what path you were on. Hereafter, I shall let you know the path.
ro: kyomade wa donna michi yara shirenanda   korekara saki wa michi o shirasuru
jp_1: けふまでハとんなみちやらしれなんだ
jp_2: これからさきハみちをしらする

en: What do you think this path is about? The regret of Tsukihi is the single concern.
ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   Tsukihi zannen ichijo no koto
jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
jp_2: 月日ざんねんいちじよの事

en: What do you think My regret is about? The matter of the Kanrodai is My greatest regret.
ro: kono zanen nanino koto ya to omou kana   Kanrodai ga ichi no zannen
jp_1: このざねんなにの事やとをもうかな
jp_2: かんろふ大が一のざんねん

en: This regret of Mine is no small matter. There is no knowing what returns Tsukihi will give.
ro: kono zanen chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   donna kayashi o Tsukihi suru yara
jp_1: このざねん一寸の事でハないほどに
jp_2: どんなかやしを月日するやら

en: Whatever may happen, bear no grudge. It is what each of you has done to yourself.
ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo uramina yo   mina meme ni shite oita no ya
jp_1: どのよふな事がありてもうらみなよ
jp_2: みなめゑ／＼にしてをいたのや

en: Hereafter, unto all places in the world however far, in the high mountains as well as in the low valleys,
ro: konosaki wa sekaiju wa dokomade mo   takayama nitemo tanisoko made mo
jp_1: このさきハせかへぢううハとこまでも
jp_2: 高山にてもたにそこまでも

en: Know that I shall sweep the heart of each of you in the world step by step.
ro: korekara wa sekai ichiretsu dandan to   mune no soji o suru to omoe yo
jp_1: これからハせかい一れつたん／＼と
jp_2: むねのそふちをするとをもへよ

en: What do you think of this sweeping, all of you? No one knows the mind of God.
ro: kono soji nanto omouzo mina no mono   Kami no kokoro o tare mo shiromai
jp_1: このそふぢなんとをもうぞみなのもの
jp_2: 神の心をたれもしろまい

en: Whatever regrets Tsukihi has borne, they were overlooked quietly until now.
ro: Tsukihi niwa donna zanen ga aru totemo   imamade jitto miyurushite ita
jp_1: 月日にハどんなざねんがあるとても
jp_2: いまゝでぢいとみゆるしていた

en: Now the day is fully pressing. In any case, I cannot help but give returns.
ro: sa kyo wa hi mo jubun ni tsunde kita   nandemo kayashi sezu ni iraren
jp_1: さあけふハ日もぢうふんにつんできた
jp_2: なんでもかやしせずにいられん

en: What do you think the returns are about? They are solely about the regret of God.
ro: kono kayashi nanino koto ya to omote iru   Kami no zannen bakari naru zo ya
jp_1: このかやしなにの事やとをもている
jp_2: 神のさんねんばかりなるぞや

en: Do not think this regret is a small matter. It is a result of causes accumulated and piled up.
ro: kono zanen chotto no koto towa omouna yo   tsumori kasanari yue no koto ya de
jp_1: このざねん一寸の事とハをもうなよ
jp_2: つもりかさなりゆへの事やで

en: To Tsukihi, all of you in the world are My children. Though My thoughts for you are filled with love,
ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju wa mina waga ko   kawai ippai omote iredomo
jp_1: 月日にハせかいぢううハみなハが子
jp_2: かハいゝばいをもていれども

en: No one is aware of it, and the ponderings of each of you are only of dust.
ro: sore shirazu mina ichiretsu wa meme ni   hokori bakari o shiyan shite iru
jp_1: それしらすみな一れつハめへ／＼に
jp_2: ほこりばかりをしやんしている

en: Please think of the regret of God over such minds. Indeed, nothing more can be said, even should I so desire.
ro: kono kokoro Kami no zannen omote kure   domu nantomo yu ni yuwaren
jp_1: この心神のざんねんをもてくれ
jp_2: どふむなんともゆうにゆハれん

en: I shall not repeat what I have said until now. From now on, you need only to be spiritually awakened.
ro: imamade no yo naru koto wa yuwan de na   korekara saki wa satori bakari ya
jp_1: いまゝでのよふなる事ハゆハんでな
jp_2: これからさきハさとりばかりや

en: Hereafter, there is no knowing what I shall say. I request that you ponder thoroughly.
ro: konosaki wa nani o yu yara shiren de na   dozo shikkari shiyan shite kure
jp_1: このさきハなにをゆうやらしれんでな
jp_2: どふぞしかりしやんしてくれ

en: Sato, Sato, Ta-oto, Ta-oto, Byo-sama, Byo-sama...
ro: Sato Sato Taoto Taoto Byosama Byosama
jp_1: さと／＼たをと／＼びよさま／＼

en: If this talk coincides sign for sign, know that everything proceeds in this way.
ro: kono hanashi aizu tateyai deta naraba   nani ni tsuitemo mina kono tori
jp_1: このはなしあいづたてやいでたならば
jp_2: なにゝついてもみなこのとふり

en: I earnestly request each and everyone of you to ponder deeply.
ro: kore oba na ichiretsu kokoro shiyan tanomu de
jp_1: これをはな一れつ心しやんたのむで

ro: nichinichi ni kokoro tsukushita monodane o   Kami ga tashikani uketorite iru
jp_1: にち／＼に心つくしたものだねを
jp_2: 神がたしかにうけとりている

ro: shinjitsu ni Kami no uketoru monodane wa   itsu ni naritemo kusaru me wa nashi
jp_1: しんぢつに神のうけとるものだねわ
jp_2: いつになりてもくさるめわなし

ro: dandan to kono monodane ga haeta nara   kore matsudai no Koki naru zo ya
jp_1: たん／＼とこのものだねがはへたなら
jp_2: これまつだいのこふきなるそや
